column2: Ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia burabangamiwe n'intambara ya Tigray
column3: Intambara y'imbere muri Ethiopia imaze amezi 10, imaze guhitana abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi, abaharurwa muri za miriyoni barata izabo abandi na bo bari mu kaga  aho bakeneye imfashanyo. Ariko ivyo si vyo vyonyene imaze kwonona ku gihugu kiza ubugira kabiri mu kubamwo abantu benshi muri Afrika - intambara imaze kwonona vyinshi no mu butunzi, bishobora gufata imyaka n'iyindi kugira bisanurwe. Ku mugwa mukuru Addis - Ababa, Tigist w'imyaka 26, atashimye ko amazina yiwe yose akoreshwa, avuga ko amafaranga akoresha ku kwezi ku kwezi ubu yigwije na kabiri kubera imvo zibiri: intambara yadutse muri Tigray mu kwezi kwa cumi  na rimwe hamwe n'ikiza ca coronavirus. Avuga ati: "Imbere y'intambara na Covid, nakoresha birr 1.000 (nk'ama dorari 22) buri kwezi mu gusuma ivyo guteka. Ubu nkoresha birr 2.000". "Ubu ibintu birazimvye gusumba, terefone, impuzu, ivyo kurya." Ibiharuro vyo kugereranya bitangwa n'inzego za reta vyerekana ko ibiciro vy'ivyankenerwa koko vyaduze  muri Ethiopia - muri rusangi mu kwezi kw'indwi vyari  ica kane hejuru y'uko vyari bimeze nk'ico gihe nyene mu mwaka uheze. Tigist akora mw'isoko-duka (supermarket) kugira ashobore gufasha umuryango. Wewe ajejwe gusuma ivyo kurya, musazawe nawe akariha inzu. Avuga kandi ko ''kuvunja idorari na vyo bitameze neza. Mu mwaka uheze, kw'idorari rimwe ($1)  waronka birr 35, ubu uronka 45." Faisal Roble, umuhinga  ari muri Amerika yihweza ibintu n'ibindi na cane cane ivyo mu karere k'ihembe rya Afrika, avuga ko gukoresha amafaranga mu bikorwa vy'intambara bigira "ingaruka mbi ku bushobozi bwa Ethiopia bwo gushikira ama dorari ''  bigatuma kandi urugero rwo kuvunja rutituka. Ntibizwi amafaranga yose intambara imaze gutwara uko angana ariko ikigo citwa Trading Economics kigereranya ko amafaranga aja mu vya gisirikare azoshika kuri miriyoni 502 z'ama dorari gushika mu mpera z'uyu mwaka, mu gihe zari miriyoni  460 mu mwaka uheze. Mu   ndwi iheze umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU Antonio Guterres yavuze ko iyo ntanbara imaze gutwara igihugu umuriyaridi w'ama dorari. Imbere y'intambara n'ikiza ca coronavirus, ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia bwari mu bunyaruka kwiyongera cane mu karere, bwaduga muri rusangi ku rugero rwa 10% ku mwaka mu myaka 10 yo gushika mu 2019, nk'uko bigereranywa na banki y'isi (Banque Mondiale). Mu gihe Tigist avuga urugero rwo kuvunja muri banki, Roble avuga ko birr (ifaranga rya Ethiopia) kw'isoko isanzwe ho ryakorotse gusumba, ubu idorari rimwe rikaba rivunjwa birr  67. Avuga ko abagwizatunga muri ico gihugu ubu imitsi yama yaranze kubera ikibazo c'umutekano mu gihe intambara ubu yarenze imbibe za Tigray ikaba igeze mu ntara bihana imbibe za Afar na Amhara. Intambara yatanguye igihe umugambwe wahora utwara intara ya Tigray, Tigray  People's Liberation Front (TPLF) watera amakambi ya gisirikare mu kwezi kwa 11, biturutse ku kutumvikana ku bibazo vya poritike n'umushikiranganji wa mbere, Abiy Ahmed. Kuva ico gihe, ingabo za Ethiopia - hamwe n'ingabo za Eritrea zibashigikiye, bafatanije n'igipolisi n'utundi tugwi tugendana ibigwanisho, baciye batangura intambara imaze gusesa amaraso menshi, yo kugwanya TPLF. Impande zompi zimaze kwagirizwa gukora amahano, harimwo gusambanya ku nguvu no kwica  ikivunga abanyagihugu basanzwe. Intara ya Tigray nta vyankenerwa ikironka, harimwo uburyo bwo gutumatumanako hamwe na banki, kuva reta ya Ethiopia ifashe ingingo yo kwugarana iyo ntara mu kwezi kwa gatandatu, inyuma y'aho abagwanyi ba Tigray bigaruriye umugwa mukuru Mekelle. Abantu 400.000 muri Tigray ubu babayeho nk'abugarijwe n'inzara mu gihe  kubashikiriza imfashanyo bigorana cane, umuyagankuba n'ibitoro na vyo bikaba biboneka nabi nabi bigatuma ibiciro biduga. Filmon Berhane aba muri Mekelle yabwiye BBC mu rurimi rw'igi-Tigrinya ko ibiciro vy'ivyo kurya n'amazu muri iyi minsi vyaduze cane. Yavuze ati: "Nta mafaranga ahari  kuko amabanki yose arugaye, muri reta na ho ntibagitanga imishashara". Mu makungu, iyo ntambara yagize ingaruka kw'izina rya Ethiopia nk'igihugu co kujanamwo imitahe nk'uko bivugwa na Irgard Erasamus wo mu kigo ca NKC African Economics. Madame  Erasmus afatira akarorero nko ku gisata c'amaterefone co muri Ethiopia caheruka gushirwa kw'isoko y'abikorera ku giti cabo, aho cari cakweze abanyamitahe benshi barimwo abo muri Afrika y'Epfo nk'igihangange MTN. Ariko amaherezo kompanyi imwe gusa ni yo yahavuye ihiganirwa rumwe mu mpusha zibiri zari zashizwe kw'isoko, n'urufatanye rw'amakompanyi rurongowe na Safaricom yo muri Kenya ku mafaranga angana na miriyoni 850 y'amadorari. Abahinga bavuga ko intambara ya Tigray yatumye abanyamitahe bacika intege. Ukwiyongera kw'ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia muri rusangi uyu mwaka kugereranywa ko kuzogabanuka cane kuva kuri 6% mu 2020 gushika ku 2% mu 2021 - urugero rwa mbere rwo hasi mu myaka hafi 20, ku bw'ikigega mpuzamakungu FMI. Igihugu kigurira hanze ibintu biciye miriyaridi 14 z'amadorari ku mwaka, mu gihe kigurisha ibiciye  imiriyaridi 3,4 z'ama dorari. Hari n'amakenga ku kwiyongera kw'ideni rya reta ya Ethiopia mu gihugu hagati, aho hari abagereranya ko rizoshika ku miriyaridi 60 z'ama dorari uyu mwaka, hafi y'ibice 70% y'umwimbu rusangi wo muri ico gihugu. Mu gihe Amerika yafatiye ingingo zimwe zimwe zerekeye impusha zo kuja muri ico gihugu abanye Ethiopia bafise uruhara muri iyo ntambara, kandi ikanahagarika zimwe zimwe mu mfashanyo yaha Ethiopia, gushika ubu amakungu yirinze kuremera cane reta ku bijanye n'ubutunzi, canke ngo ahagarike imigambi y'imfashanyo y'ubutunzi,  hafi ica kane c'abanyagihugu babayeho musi y'urugero rw'ubukene, na yo muri rusangi umwimbu w'umunyagihugu ungana n'amadorari 850 ku mwaka.

column2: Kenya-Ruto: Icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu aravuga ku kubuzwa urugendo
column3: Icegera c'umukuru wa Kenya William Ruto avuga ko ingingo  y'abategetsi yo kumubuza   gufata urugendo rwo kuja mu  gihugu kibanyi ca Uganda ari integuro yo kumutera umutima mubi nk'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu no kubangamira ivyo yifuza gushikako muri poritike. Mu kiganiro n'iradiyo yo muri Kenya (Inooro FM) mu gitondo co kuri uyu wa gatatu, William Ruto yavuze ko muri kahise yari amaze gufata ingendo z'akazi canke ziwe bwite ata ntambamyi. Yasiguye ko urugendo rwiwe rwari rugamije kwigira ku kigega c'ubutunzi muri  Uganda mu ntumbero y'umugambi w'ubutunzi  aherutse gutanguza wa 'Bottoms Up' - ugamije guteza imbere ubuzima bw'abantu baronka amikoro make nk'inzira yo kuzamura ubutunzi bwa Kenya. Abajijwe igituma umukuru w'igihugu ata na kimwe yari azi kuri urwo rugendo, Ruto yaciye yigovyora mu kubaza ngo: ''Urazi neza ko umukuru w'igihugu atarwo yari azi?' Harun Aydin ajemwo gute? Ruto yabandanije avuga ko mu myaka icenda amaze ari icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu atari bwigere asabwa kubanza gusaba uruhusha ku ngendo ziwe zo hanze  y'igihugu, aca anibaza igituma ivyo bishitse ubu. Ruto  yanatanze umuco ku muntu aturuka muri Turkiya, Harun Aydin yari  ku rutonde rw'abo bari kujana muri urwo  rugendo. Yavuze ko Aydin ari umugwizatunga afise imitahe muri Kenya, akaba anashaka kwagurira ibikorwa vyiwe muri Uganda na Tanzania. Umwidondoro n'ubutumwa bw'uwo mugwizatunga vyatumye hari ibibazo vyibazwa biranavugwa cane mu binyamakuru bitandukanye mu gihugu. Icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu yavuze ko ari ''ugusara hamwe na poritike itagira agaciro'' gufata uwo munyamahanga nk'uwokekwa kuba uwukora iterabwoba  ata kindi kibitumye atari uko yari amuherekeje. Ku wa mbere, inyuma yo kurindira amasaha   atatu kugira yemerewe gufata urugendo, icegera c'umukutu w'igihugu yahavuye abuzwa kwurira indege yo kuja muri Uganda. Amategeko ya reta ya Kenya asaba abakozi  bakuru  ba reta gusaba uruhusha umukuru w'akazi ka reta imbere yo  gufata ingendo zo  mu bindi bihugu - ariko kubuza icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu gufata urugendo ntaho  vyari bwigere  biba. Umukuru wa Kenya Uhuru Kenyatta n'icegera ciwe ntibagifitaniye ubucuti bari bafitaniye bagitangura amabanga yo kurongora igihugu mu 2013. Ubwo bucuti bwabo bwatosekaye kuva umunsi Prezida Uhuru Kenyatta akorana mu minwe n'uwutavuga  rumwe na reta Raila Odinga mu 2018. Kuva ico gihe icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu yaciye aba nk'uwushizwe ku ruhande mu bikorwa vy'icese vya reta. Umutegetsi wo muri reta ya Uganda Duncan Abigaba, yari asanzwe ariwe ahuza ibikorwa vy'urugendo rw'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu,  yemereye BBC ko  vy'ukuri Ruto yari yitezwe muri Uganda mu butumwa bwiwe bwite. Yasiguye ko Ruto hari inyungu arondera mu gisata c'uburimyi bw'urudandazwa no gukorera ku mugambi wiwe wo  kuri kaminuza ya Makerere wo gushinga igisata c'ivyigwa vy'uburongozi, the Dr.William Samoei Ruto Centre for Leadership. Mu kwezi guheze icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu yahagarariye itanguza rw'uruganda rw'urucanco muri Uganda ku butumire bwa prezida Yoweri Museveni. Ariko ubushikiranganji bwa Uganda bujejwe imigenderanire bwavuze ko ata rugendo rw'icegera c'umukuru wa Kenya bwari buzi. Ministre wa reta ajejwe imigenderanire, Oryem Okello yasiguye ko urwo rugendo rutamenyeshejwe ubushikiranganji bwiwe kandi ko n'abakira abashitsi batari biteguriye umuzo wiwe.

column2: Intambara ya Ukraine: umukuru wa Kharkiv yabwiye BBC ko ingabo za Russia zavuye muri ico gisagara
column3: Umukuru w'igisagara ca  Kharkiv, Ihor Terekhov, yabwiye BBC ko Abarusiya bavuye mu micungararo y'ico gisagara berekeza ku rubibe rw'Uburusiya. Avuga ko igihe kimwe ingabo z'Uburusiya zashoboye kwinjira mu gace gatoya k'ico gisagara co mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko,  ariko ko batahamaze igihe kinini. Avuga ati: "Abarusiya babandanije batera Kharkiv  amabombe y'urutavanako kubera bari bagumye hafi y'iki gisagara. Ariko kubera ubutwari bw'abajejwe gucungera umutekano wa Kharkiv n'ingabo za Akraine, Abarusiya bataye baromoka baja kure ku rubibe rw'Uburusiya. "Ubu Kharkiv iratekanye kandi n'abantu batanguye kugaruka bukebuke muri iki gisagara. Abantu bose turabaha amazi, gaze n'umuyagankuba. Ikibazo gusa, ni uko amazu y'abantu yabomaguwe canke akononekara. Rero mu misi iri imbere tuzoba dufise igikorwa gikomeye co gusanura". "Haraciye imisi itanu ata ma bombe atewe muri kino gisagara. Icabaye conyene ni uko Abarusiya bagerageje gutera igisasu ca misire hafi y'ikibuga c'indege ca Kharkiv, ariko iyi misire yaciye isamburwa n'igisirikare ca Ukraine". Umukuru w'iki gisagara ashikirije aya majambo inyuma y'aho ikigo cigisha ibijanye n'intambara Institute for the Study of War, kibona ko Ukraine "isa n'iyamaze gutsinda intambara ya Kharkiv". Mu mwihwezo iki kigo giherutse kugira ku bijanye n'iyi ntambara, abahinga bemerwa cane mu vya gisirikare bavuga ko Uburusiya bwananiwe no kugota iki gisagara ca Ukraine kigira kabiri - kandi ko bwahevye uwo mugambi. Amakuru ava ku rubuga rw'intambara avuga vyabaye ngombwa ko ingabo z'Uburusiya ziva muri iki gisagara zirukanywe na Ukraine isa n'iyariko "iratsinda" urugamba rwo muri kino gisagara, nk'uko bivugwa n'iki kigo cubahwa cane muri Amerika. Amakuru ya nyuma yatangwa n'iki kigo yashigikira ibi vyavugwa, aho umuvugizi w'ibiro bikuru vya gisirikare wa Ukraine yasubirwamwo na AFP avuga ko muri ako karere, "umwansi ariko ashira inguvu zose gukura ingabo ziwe mu gisagara ca Kharkiv". Ni mu gihe abanyamakuru ba Reuters bavuga ko kino gisagara kiri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko kimaze indwi zibiri gitekanye. Ariko bivugwa ko Moscou ikibandanya icucagira ibibombe mu turere two mu micungararo yaco - harimwo akarere ka Dergachi kari ku birometero 10 mu buraruko bwa Kharkiv. Mu masaha yitereye y'ejo ku wa gatanu, ibinyamakuru vy'Uburusiya vyatangaje ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zateye ikigo c'ububiko bw'ibirwanisho muri aka karere. Kharkiv, igisagara kiri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko, rimwe na rimwe gikunze kwitwa igisagara ntavogerwa. Iri zina cararironse muri ino ntambara. Kuva igitero gitanguye, intumbero nyamukuru y'ingabo z'Uburusiya kwari ukwigarurira iki gisagara. Ariko, mu kiringo c'amezi arenga abiri, uretse ko zananiwe no gushika kuri iyo ntumbero kandi ko - ariko ibi bikavugwa n'iki kigo c'abahinga co mu Bwongereza - zahevye uwu mugambi. Ingabo za Ukraine zivugwa ko zirukanye iż'Uburusiya gushika ku rubibe, hakaba hari amakuru avuga ko ingabo zo muri za ntara zishaka kwiyonkora kuri Ukraine za Donetsk na Luhansk zikaba zegamiye Uburusiya, zirindirijwe kwinjira mu Burusiya. Hagati aho, ibi si ukuvuga ko zasubiye inyuma rwose nk'uko vyagenze mu micungararo y'umugwa mukuru Kyiv. Kubona Uburusiya bwashoboye gusa gushinga ku nguvu ubutegetsi bwabwo mu gisagara kimwe gusa ca Ukraine - Kherson - vyerekana ko igitero c'Uburusiya ataho kiragera mu bijanye n'intumbero bwari bufise kuri Ukraine, nk'uko bivugwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'Ubwongereza bwo kwivuna abansi. Mu makuru ya nyuma bwatanze, ubu bushikiranganji buvuga ko ubutegetsi bwa gisivire na gisirikare bwashinzweho n'Uburusiya muri Kherson bwatangaje ko bugiye gusaba ako karere kegukira Uburusiya bubicishije muri kamarampaka. Buvuga ko mu gihe iyi kamarampaka yokunda, nta nkeka ko Uburusiya "buzokora amanyanga ku bizoyivamwo kugira bwerekane ko benshi bashigikiye ko biyonkora kuri Ukraine. Hagati aho, ubu bushikiranganji bwongerako y'uko kubona Uburusiya bwashoboye gushinga ku nguvu ubutegetsi bwabwo mu gisagara kimwe gusa ca Ukraine vyerekana ko intumbero shingiro yabwo yo "gushinga ubutegetsi bwegamiye Uburusiya mu turere twinshi twa Ukraine wananiwe".

column2: Umupfasoni Claudette avuga ko arenza 200kg ari mu maganya kubera ubuvyibuhe
column3: Mu buzima busanzwe kuri we, Claudette Nyirangendo avuga ko ari nk'ukwurira umusozi buri musi, ibi bikavana n'ukwiremera kubera ubuvyibuhe burenze urugero ubu bwahagaritse ibikorwa biboneka ko ari ibisanzwe kuri buri muntu ariko kuri we bikaba amagorwa. Ntaherutse kwipimisha uburemere ariko ubu yibaza ko arenza ibiro 200. Ku myaka 43, uyu mupfasoni abaye mu maganya akavuga ko yipfuza kubona uburemere bw'umubiri wiwe bugabanutse. Claudette ati: "Ubuzima burandemereye cane, rimwe rimwe ndashobora kumara n'imisi ibiri canke itatu ntavuye mu gitanda, kubera ingorane zo gutambuka bivanye n'uko niremereye". Uyu munyarwandakazi Claudette arasigura ingene yari abayeho neza mu bwana bwiwe  n'igihe yari akiri umuyabaga. Yibuka ko ico gihe atari avyibushe uko avyibushe ubu. Avuga ko atazi igituma yavyibushe birenze urugero mu myaka itandatu iheze mu gihe afungura indya kama zo mu gihugu ciwe zisanzwe ziribwa n'abandi, nk'akarorero ibitoke n'imboga. Ubu buvyibuhe bwamuteye ibibazo vyinshi na cane cane iyo yibutse ko kimwe mu vyamutumye yahukana gifitaniye isano n'ubuvyibuhe bwiwe burenze urugero. Uyu mupfasoni avuga ko umugabo wiwe yaruhishijwe no kubandanya abana nawe kubera uburemere bwiwe, akavuga ko yama avyidoga igihe cose bamaranye bubakanye. Ati: "Jewe nari umuvyeyi n'umukenyezi mwiza, ariko ndibaza ko atashoboye kwihanganira ubuvyibuhe bwanje, bituma anta aca yigira kwiberaho ukwiwe. Ubu rero, mbeshejweho gusa n'umukobwa wanje amfasha ikintu ico ari co cose kuko ata bushobozi mfise bwo kwunama". Uyu mukenyezi avuga ko yari yubakanye n'umugabo wa mbere bamaranye imyaka itari mike ariko akavamwo apfa akamusiga ari umupfakazi areze abana bane. Inyuma y'aho, yakundanye n'uwundi mugabo birangira barongoranye, bakaba bavyaranye umwana umwe imbere y'uko amuheba. Ubu aho ari, abanye n'uyu mwana wiwe akavuga ko abayeho mu buzima bugoye cane. Iyindi ngorane nini ni uko gutembera kuri we ari ikibazo gikomeye. Aho asanzwe aba, utuzu twa surwumwe turi hanze kandi ni duto cane ku buryo adashobora kwinjira kubera ubuvyibuhe bwiwe, ibi bikunyurwa n'uko adashobora no kwunama. Claudette ati: "Mfise umubabaro mwinshi cane kubona ubuvyibuhe bwanje bwanshikanye aho ntashoboye no kwifasha mu bintu vyanje vyihariye, aho no kwihagarika nkenera uwumfasha, aha nkavuga umukobwa wanje amfasha vyose kubera ntashobora gushika kuri karya kazu ka surwumwe, sinokwirwa mu muryango kandi uburemere bwanje ntibunyemerera kwunama". Hampande y'ibi, uyu mugore avuga ko kugirira isuku umubiri wiwe kenshi ari ingorane. Hari igihe vyanka ko ashika mu bwogero akenshi bikaba ngombwa ko yihanagura gusa. Muri kino gihe, ariko ararondera uburyo butandukanye kugira ngo atangure kugabanya ubuvyibuhe. Avuga ko ibikorwa vyinshi bimusaba ko aba ari hanze vyahagaze, akaba atazi ico yokora. Umwikomo niwo uranga ubuzima bwiwe kubera yama ariko yiyumvira ubuvyibuhe bwiwe, akicwa n'irungu ryo kwama yicaye muhira imisi yose adashobora gutembera canke guhagarara umwanya muremure. Hagati aho, Claudette aracafise icizere ko azohava atora inyishu y'ukungene yogabanya ubuvyibuhe. Nk'uko bivugwa n'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi n'imbuga ngurukanabumenyi zitandukanye zivuga ibijanye n'amagara, ubuvyibuhe burenze urugero buvana n'amavuta arenze aguma yiyongera mu mubiri gushika ku rugero rwo kwonona amagara y'umuntu. Kugira ngo umuntu avugwe ko avyibushe kandi aremereye birenze urugero, bafatira ku burebure bw'umuntu n'uburemere afise. Abahinga mu bijanye n'amagara y'abantu bavuga ko ubuvyibuhe burenze urugero ari bubi cane ku magara y'umuntu kandi ko bushobora gutuma yandura indwara canke zikiyongera, harimwo  umuvuduko w'amaraso, indwara z'umutima n'ibibazo vyo guhema. Ubuvyibuhe burenze urugero akenshi burava ku bintu bitandukanye harimwo gufungura indya zirimwo isukari nyinshi (glucoses). Kutagira imyimenyerezo ngororamubiri hamwe n'uduce ndangakamere mvukanwa twihariye, hakaba n'abandi bake baba bafise uduce ndangakamere hamwe n'imisemburo canke inkabuzo bidakora neza. Bavuga ko gufungura neza n'imyimenyerezo ngororamubiri ari nzo nzira nkuru zo gutorera umuti ubuvyibuhe burenze urugero.

column2: Ingwano ya Ukraine: Nta ntambwe kw'ihagarikwa ry'intambara inyuma y'ibiganiro hagati ya Kiyv na Moscou
column3: Ikiringo ca mbere c'ibiganiro hagati y'abashikiranganji b'imigenderanire b'Uburusiya na Ukraine  ntaco cashitseko ku bijanye no guhagarika intambara, nk'uko bivugwa na UKraine. Inyuma y'ivyo biganiro vyabereye muri Turkia, umushikiranganji wa Ukraine ajejwe imigedneranire, Dmytro Kuleba, yavuze ko ivyasabwe na mugenziwe w'Uburusiya  Sergei Lavrov ari nko gusaba ko bamanika amaboko. Hagati aho Lavrov yavuze ko igitero ca gisirikare igihugu ciwe cagavye kiriko kiragenda uko categuwe. Ivyo biganiro vyabaye  Uburusiya bwaraye buteye ama bombe ku bitaro vy'abana, Ukraine ivuga ko ari "icaha co mu ntambara". Abategetsi bavuga ko abantu batatu barimwo umwana baguye muri ico gitero mu gisaga ca Mariupol kiri mu  bumanuko   bushira ubuseruko. Haheze indwi  zibiri Uburisiya bugavye igitero ku gihugu cose ca Ukraine, kuva ico gihe abantu miriyoni 2.3 bakaba bamaze guhunga igihugu. Aho abantu bugarijwe n'akaga kurusha ahandi ni muri  Mariupol, nk'uko Kuleba yabivuze, mu gihe abanyagihugu bagotewe mu bukonje bwinshi ata muyagankuba ata mazi. Yavuze yamara ko Uburusiya butiyemeje kutanga inzira abantu bocamwo  kandi ko  butemeye ivyasabwe na Ukraine ko hoba uguhagarika intambara  mu gihugu cose ku mvo z'impuhwe ku bantu. Yavuze ati : "Nshaka nongere kuvuga ko Ukraine itamanitse amaboko, kandi ntizomanika amaboko," yongerako ko afise ubushake bwo kubandanya ibiganiro. Ku ruhande rwiwe, umushikiranganji w'Uburusiya ajejwe imigenderanire nta na kimwe yemeye aca asubiramwo ivyo Uburusiya busaba ko Ukraine ivanwamwo ibigwanisho ikemera no kuba  igihugu ataho cegemiye. Yavuze ko Uburusiya burindiriye inyishu ya Kiyv. Lavrov yagirije  kandi Uburaya gukongereza ingwano mu kubandanya bahaba ibigwanisho Ukraine. Yavuze ko Uburusiya buzorinda ibihano vya Buraya hanyuma bugasohoka iyo ngwano "bwemye kandi butekanye ku mutima kurusha ubu". "Ndabarahiye ko tuzobaho muri ivyo bihano kandi tugakora ibishoboka vyose kugira ntizokwigere dusubira kuzera ku banya-Buraya, mu bice vyose vy'ubuzima bwacu." Umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU António Guterres yavuze ko ico gitero "giteye ubwoba" nazo Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zagiriza Ubusiya "gukoresha bunyamaswa inguvu za gisirikare mu gutota abanyagihugu basazwe". Ariko mu kiganiro ciwe n'abamenyeshamakuru, Lavrov  yahakanye ibivugwa ko ari icaha c'intambara muri Mariupol , avuga ko ivyo bitaro vyo  kuvyariramwo vyari vyacumbitswemwo n'ingabo za Ukraine. Igisagara ca Mariupol - kibamwo abantu bashika  400.000  -  kimaze iminsi gikikujwe n'ingabo z'Ubususiya , igihe cose hageragejwe ko hoba guhagarika intabara kugira abanyagihugu basanzwe basohoke bikaba vyaranse. "Igisagara cose nta muyagankuba, nta mazi, nta vyo kurya  gifise, ico arico cose, abantu bariko baricwa n'umwumira", nk'uko Olena Stokoz wa Croix Rouge ya Ukraine yabwiwiye BBC kuri uyu wa gatatu.

column2: Burundi: Abasenyeri gatolika bavuga ko utunenge mu matora bakibaza niba ivyayavuyemwo vyizigirwa
column3: Inama nkuru y'Abepiskopi b'I Burundi (CECAB) ivuga ko amatora aheruka yo ku wa 20 z'uku kwa gatanu yaranzwe n'utungenge twinshi twatumye ivyayavuyemwo bibaza niba ari ivyo kwizigira. Mw'itangazo baraye basohoye kuri uyu wa 26/5, abepiskopi 'i Burundi bamenyesha ko barungitse indorerezi 2,716 mu makomine yose, zigashobora kuja ku tuzu tw'amatora batoye. Evariste Ndayishimiye niwe yatangajwe ku vy'agateganyo n'umurwi CENI ujejwe amatora ko yatsinze ayo matora n'amajwi 68%, Agathon Rwasa akaza ubwa kabiri n'amajwi 24%. Umugambwe CNL wa Agathon Rwasa be nawe ubwiwe, ntibemera ivyayavuyemwo. Uwutemera ivyatangajwe na CENI afise umunsi ntarengwa w'uyu munsi ku wa gatatu ngo yiture sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro. Mw'iryo tangazo, abasenyeri bavuga ko muri rusangi amatora yabaye mw'ituze, ariko y'uko hari utunenge twinshi dushingiye kw'ihonyangwa ry'ubwigenge, ukudafata kumwe abitoza n'abatora. Utunenge abo basenyeri bashira ahabona twashoboye kubonwa n'izo ndorerezi zabo aho zashoboye gushika ni utu: "Igitsure catewe bamwe mu baserukiye abitoza ngo batere igikumu ku mpapuro z'ivyegeranyo vy'ivyavuye mu matora imbere y'uko baharura"; "Amasandugu amwe amwe yashizwemo amakarata y'amajwi arenze (bourrage des urnes)"; "Abatoreye abantu bapfuye be n'impunzi"; "Abantu wasanga bafise amakete yo gutorera abandi menshi, ivyo navyo bitemewe". "Mu tuzu tw'amatora tumwe tumwe hari abantu batoye incuro zirenga imwe". "Hari abaserukiye abitoza be n'indorerezi birukanywe mu guharura amajwi". "Hari bamwe mu batora bakorewe iterabwoba baterwa n'igitsure na bamwe mu bategetsi banabaherekeza no mu bwiherero". "Abantu batemewe n'amategeko biyadukiza bakinjira mu bibanza vyo guharuriramwo amajwi". "Gutora mw'ibanga bitubahirijwe". "Bamwe mu bahagarikizi baratswe impapuro zibaha uburenganzira bwo guhagararira amatora banakwa n'amaterefone yabo". Abo basenyeri gatorika mu Burundi babona ko utwo tunenge dutuma bibaza niba ivyari vyitezwe gutangazwa vyizigirwa. Babona kandi ko hari abariko barahohotera canke bashaka guturubika ababanyi babo inyuma y'aya matora, babahora ko badasangiye ivyiyumviro, bagasaba abategetsi guhana abo bantu. Bati: "Mu gihe amategeko yemera ko haba abahiganwa benshi, buri munyagihugu yari afise uburenganzira bwo kwerekana uwo yipfuza gushigikira". Abo basenyeri basaba ko uwumva ko yarenganijwe yokwirinda gukoresha imigumuko, agaca mu nziza y'ubutungane kugira ngo atunganirizwe. Mu matora atatu yabaye kuwa gatatu uheze, ihiganwa ryari rikomeye ryari hagati y'umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi hamwe na CNL utavuga rumwe nawo. Imigambwe imwe n'abandi bitoje ku giti cabo ku mwanya w'umukuru w'igihugu baremeye ivyavuye mu matora n'ubwo banenze utunenge tumwe tumwe twibonekeje. Hagati aho, umugambwe CNL uvuga ko amatora yabayemwo ubusuma, ukavuga ko washoboye kwegeranya ivyegeranyo vy'amatora vyerekana ko ari wo wayatsinze. Domitien Ndayizeye witoza ashizwe imbere n'urunani Kira Burundi, yabwiye BBC utunenge yabonye twabaye mu matora, ariko avuga ko "igihe uwatowe azoba amaze kwemezwa na CENI ubwa nyuma nta kizomubuza gutwara Uburundi". Umugwi CENI ujejwe gutegura amatora wowo wemeza ko amatora yagenze neza. Sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro utegerezwa kumenyesha ibiharuro ntabanduka vyayavuyemwo ku wa 04 z'ukwa gatandatu.

column2: Gasape: Urubuga hwaniro rwa mbere rutangujwe n'Umurundi
column3: Umurundi Saxe Perry Gateka asanzwe arongoye Radio Humuriza FM aheruka gutanguza urubuga hwaniro, rushobora kuba ari rwo rwambere rutangujwe n'umuntu ava muri ico gihugu. Urwo rubuga rukora co kimwe n'izindi zisanzwe zimenyerewe nka Facebook canke Twitter, aho abarwiyandikishako basangira amakuru yanditse, amafoto canke za video, ku buryo bwihariye bagashirako n'amajwi. Aho yavugana na BBC, Saxe Perry yavuze yuko yashatse kugira urubuga hwaniro rukora nk'izindi zihasanzwe mbere ngo rukagira ico ruzirushije. Yagize ati: "... nagerageje kwihweza izindi mbuga dusanzwe dukoresha nka za Facebook n'izindi, mugabo nkabona ko ari ibintu bikomeye cane umuntu atoshikako. WhatsApp igiye kwibandaniriza n'impinduka n'aho uwu mugambi wayo wateye induru Australia yashyizeho itegeko ryo gutuma Google na Facebook biriha amakuru Biden, ikibazo kuri Zuckerberg na Facebook "... naragize ivyigwa vya multimedia mu buhinga bwa kure ngerageje kuri internet, hanyuma ntangura gukora kugira nshobore kwihanga abantu b'abanyamahanga... nagize nti nshaka kwipima ku bihangange vya kure bikomakomeye.." Abajijwe ico urwo rubuga rwiwe rusumvya izindi, Saxe Perry yatanze akarorero avuga ko ku zindi mbuga nka Facebook canke Youtube udashobora gushirako amajwi yonyene, ariko ku rubuga rwiwe Gasape ivyo ngo birashoboka. Ku basanzwe bakoresha  Facebook na Youtube, urashobora gushirako ifoto canke video, ariko amajwi yonyene ukwayo, atari kumwe n'amashusho, ntibikunda. Ku kibazo co kumenya abaza ku rubuga Gasabe abo ari bo n'ico baba barondera, Saxe Perry yavuze   yuko ataramemya neza abaruzako abo aribo. Yagize ati: "...[runo rubuga] rushobora kuba ruriko rurakoreshwa  n'abantu bari hafi ya miriyoni zitatu. Rero sinovuga ngo ni Abarundi gusa, ariko ico nizera ni uko benshi muri bo ari Abarundi. "Ariko usivye ko harimwo n'abanyamahanga kuko turamaze kubona abantu basaba nk'ivyo twita 'ama verification y'ama page yabo', tugasanga abaturungikiye ivyangombwa vyabo ni abazungu, ni abanyamahanga. "Rero novuga yuko muri rusangi ari abantu bari kw'isi yose barukoresha... sinagomvye ko runo rubuga rwitwa urw'Abarundi gusa, ni nayo mpamvu rutiswe Gasape.bi, rwiswe Gasape.com..." Saxe Perry yamye ari umwana akerebutse. Mu mwaka wa 2005, afise imyaka 14 y'amavuko, akoresheje utwuma atoraguye hirya no hino, yarahinguye insamirizi (radio transmitter), ico gihe aca atangura kumenyekana no gushika ku rwego rwo hejuru mu gihugu. Aho niho yahereye ashinga Radio Humuriza FM ubu yumvikana mu ntara zishika icenda zo mu Burundi. Radio Humuriza FM mbere yahavuye ikorana na BBC Gahuzamiryango, icemerewe gukorera mu Burundi, aho yaza iracisha amakuru yayo kuri Humuriza FM. Mu 2017 yatowe muri wa mugambi wa Young African Leaders aja muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, akarisha ubwenge mu bitangazamakuru bitandukanye ari naho yakuye iciyumviro co gukora urubuga hwaniro. Agarutse yashinze Humuriza TV iboneka iciye ku buhinga bwa Facebook, uno mwaka naho rero akaba yatanguje urubuga hwaniro Gasape, ruboneka kuri internet co kimwe na application ija muri telephone ngendanwa. Saxe Perry avuga yuko ahanini mu bijanye n'uburyo akoresha yimenya, mu majambo yiwe akagira ati "jewe igihe cose namye ndya ikiremve ndacirasheko". Abandanya ati: "Nta muntu novuga ngo ariko aramfasha mu bijanye n'uburyo kuva ntangura runo rubuga kuko iyo mba nari mfise uburyo nari kurukora nko mu ndwi zibiri gusa." Yavuze yuko yamaze imyaka ibiri yegeranya uburyo yaba mu bijanye no kugura ama 'serveurs' canke kugura ibijanye n'umutekano kugira ntihagire abavogera urubuga rwiwe. Avuga kandi yuko mu gihe asanzwe arongoye ibitangazamakuru Humuriza FM na Humuriza TV, hari uburyo buboneka buvuye mu bamenyekanisha  ivyo bakora babicishije kuri ivyo bitangazamakuru.

column2: Aba-Maasai TikTok yazaniye aba-fana ba Bollywood
column3: Mu mwambaro wabo uranga aba-Maasai kandi bakikijwe n'inka, abanya-Tanzania ba vuba mu kuba rurangiranwa kuri Tik Tok, abavukana Kili na Neema Paul, bariko bitegurira gufata video yabo ya vuba. Terefone ngendanwa igezweho yashinzwe ku nkingi imetero nkeya imbere y'inzu yabo muri Mindu Tulieni, ikigwati gito co mu ntara ya Pwani yo mu buseruko, Igisagara kiri hafi, Lugoba, kiri ku rugendo rw'isaha n'amaguru. Mu gihe ico kigwati ata muyagankuba gifise, Kili akigendera buri munsi kugira ashire umuriro muri terefone yiwe. Mu kwitegurira gufata iyo video , Kili, w'imyaka 26, ahagaze inyuma ya mushikiwe w'imyaka 23, Neema. Umuziki umaze gutangura kuvuga, Kili na mushikiwe baca bakurakuranwa mu kwigana  mu gi-Hindi bongera batamba  ku murindi w'izo ndirimbo zizwi cane muri  film/sinema za Bollywood [ingene bakubita iminwa bigahurirana neza neza n'amajambo y'iyo ndirimbo nk'uko womenga ijwi ni iryabo kandi humvikana iry'uwayiririmvye bwite; Lip sync). Mu mezi make aheze, izo video zabo zo gukubita iminwa zararabwe cane ku mbuga hwaniro mu Buhindi. Video yabo yamenyekanye cane, bigana  Raataan Lambiyan yo muri Shershaah , film y'uyu mwaka ya Bollywood, yarabwe incuro zirenga miriyoni imwe mu minsi mike gusa. Yakwiragijwe n'abakinyi bakuru muri iyo film Kiara Advani na Sidharth  Malhotra. Nyene kuririmba ubwa mbere iyo ndirimbo,  Jubin Nautiyal, yaratunguye abo bavukanyi igihe bagira ikiganiro c'ikibiriraho kuri imwe mu maradiyo yo mu Buhindi. Nautiyal yababwiye ati : "Bose barabazi  mu Buhindi. Muri rurangiranwa". Video bakoreye muri Mindu Tulieni, aho benshi badatunze terefone zigezweho, Kili na Neema ntibigeze bibaza ko zoshikiriye abantu baharurwa muri za miriyoni mu Buhindi no kw'isi nzima. Kili ati: "Tugitangura, vyari ibintu vyo kwiryohera gusa, ntitwigeze twibaza ko tuzomenyekana isi yose. "Maze gutangura kubona abantu bariko barayiraba n'ico bavuga mu Buhindi, naratangaye. Nararengewe." Icabatumye gukora izo video n'ugukunda film za Bollywood Kili yatanguye kuraba igihe yagenda mu mashure ku murwa mukuru , Dodoma. N'ubwo batari bazi urwo rurimi, we na mushikiwe bariyigishije kuririmba mu gi-Hindi. Kili avuga ati: "Kuva nkiri muto, nararaba ama film ya Bollywood mu ma cinema yo muri Tanzania nca ndakunda cane izo film n'indirimbo zirimwo. Iyo ukunda ikintu, biroroshe kuciga". "Binsaba iminsi mike yo kwiga amajambo y'indirimbo no kwimenyereza kuyisubiramwo. Ndarondera ico ayo majambo asigura mu congereza kugira menye uko ndayitamba neza." "N'imbere y'uko numva ico indirimbo ivuga, mba namaze kujana n'umuziki wayo." Kili yatanguye asubiramwo izo ndirimbo wenyene, mu nyuma azana mushikiwe nawe nyene asanzwe akunda film za  Bollywood. Neema avuga ati: "Igihe musazanje yansaba kugira video hamwe nawe, nabanje kwanka kuko nari mfise isoni zo kuja imbere ya camera." "Ariko mu nyuma ntangura kubimenyera. Ivy'abaye ni amayobera - ntitwigeze twibaza ko umunsi nk'uwo woshitse." Abo bavukana babiri, ubwa mbere bakuze baragira inka bakora no mu mirima, ubu umwanya bawumara batanga ibiganiro kuri television na radiyo zikomakomeye zo mu Buhindi. Ariko no mu gihugu cabo ca Tanzania, ubu baratanguye kumenyekana nka bamwe mu bazwi cane kuri Tik Tok. Konte izwi ya Kili kuri Tik Tok  ubu ifise miriyoni 1,8 y'abantu bamukurikira . Nta mwaka urakwira kuva atanguje iyo konte yiwe - amaze kumenya ivyerekeye Tik Tok abibwiwe n'abagenzi. Neema nawe aramaze kwuguruza konte yiwe kuri Instagram, ubu ikaba ifise abayikurikira bashika hafi 65.000. Ariko  mu gihe inkuru y'abo bavukana iriko irabica bigacika ku mbuga hwaniro hirya no hino kw'isi, mu muryango no mu babanyi ho basa n'uko ataco bazi kuba abana babo bariko baraba ba rurangiranwa. Kili avuga ati: "Abantu benshi ngaha ntibatunze terefone zigezweho kandi ntibazi ivyerekeye imbuga hwaniro. Na Neema nta vyinshi atahura. Biramuryohera gusa ariko ntazi ingaruka biriko biragira". "Nta muntu n'umwe yumva ivyari vyo igihe abanyamakuru batangura kuza mu kigwati iwacu bazanye n'ama-camera ya television. "Ubwa mbere umuryango wanje waguma wibaza igituma ndirimba  kandi ngatamba aho kuragira inka. "Ubu baratanguye gutahura ko ndiko ndakora ikintu ciza." Nta mafaranga barakura muri ivyo biyumviriye gukora, ariko vuba barashobora kuva mu buzima bwo mu kigwati bakaja gukina film/sinema. Ibinyamakuru vyo mu Buhindi bivuga ko baja bamaze gutangura kuronderwa cane  na Bollywood. Ni indoto zabaye ukuri kuri Kili  na Neema, bavuga ko kuva kera bamye bashaka gukora ivyo guteramisha abantu, ariko batigeze bibaza ko vyoshobotse. "Tuva mu kigwati gito hanze y'igisagara, nico gituma ntigeze nibaza ko indoto zanje zo kuba umukinyi w'ama-film no guhagarara imbere ya camera zobaye ukuri. Ivyo nabigumanye mu mutima wanje", ivyo bivugwa na Neema, we bitandukanye na musazawe,  atigeze ava muri Mundu Tulieni. "Amahirwe yo kuja mu Buhindi yoba ari igitangaza." Amakungu arorera, abo bavukana bavuga ko bafise ishaka ryo gutangura gukora izindi video zo guha ababakurikira. "Dushaka ko abantu baraba izi video bakaryoherwa, nico gituma twatanguye kuzikora." "Vyinshi biri mu nzira, abafana bacu rero ni bagume hafi." Priya Sippy n'umunyamakuru akorera uwubimusavye aba  London.

column2: Mu kwahukana, Kanye West yategetswe guha Kim Kardashian ibirezo vya 200.000$ ku kwezi
column3: Kanye West yategetswe guha Kim Kardashian ibihumbi 200 vy’amadorari y’Abanyamerika ku kwezi nk’ibirezo vy’abana mu masezerano yo kwahukana. Uyu muraperi rurangiranwa hamwe n’icamamare ku mboneshakure bazosangira kurera abana babo bane. Kardashian yuguruje urubanza rwo kwahukana mu 2021 inyuma y’imyaka umunani abana na West yahavuye ahindura izina akitwa Ye. Ibi bibaye inyuma y’aho amakompanyi atari make ahagarikiye gukorana na Ye kubera ukutumvikana ku bintu bitari bike harimwo amajambo y’urwanko ku Bayahudi. Mu kwa gatatu batangarijwe ko batakari kumwe , mbere na Kardashian ariyambura izina “West” mu mazina yiwe. Ivyo kugabura amatungo be no kurera abana navyo nyene vyaratorewe umuti muri sentare nk’uko biri mu mpapuro za sentare zashizwe ahabona ku wa kabiri. Impande zompi zizoza ziravugana ku ngingo zikomeye ku vyerekeye imibereho y’abana babo, nk’uko izo mpapuro zibivuga. Amafaranga azokoreshwa ku vyerekeye umutekano n’amashure vy’abana bazoyariha bompi. Vyongeye, Ye yiteze kuriha 200.000$ ku kwezi nk’ibirezo vy’abana – kubera, nk’uko ikinyamakuru New York Post kivyandika, abana bazomara igihe kinini kwa Kardashian. Bafitaniye abana bane: North w’imyaka 9, Saint 6, Chicago 4, na Psalm 3. Mu nzandiko zitari nke yasohoye imbere y’aha, Kardashian w’imyaka 42 yavuga ko yipfuza cane ko bahukana, akongerako ko ibi “bizofasha Kanye kwemera” ko uyu mubano warangiye. Imbere y’aha, Ye w’imyaka 45 yararwanije uyu mugambi wo kwahukana. Muri ano mezi ya vuba, yarateje impari, mbere n’amakompanyi atari make aramukurako icizere, harimwo Adidas, Gap, na Balenciaga. Uyu muraperi yaraneguwe bikomeye mu ntango z’uno mwaka inyuma y’aho yitabiriye indwi yahariwe umuderi, Semaine de la mode de Paris, yambaye agapira kanditseko icivugo ngo "White Lives Matter" – amajambo akoreshwa n’abazungu babona ko ari bo basumba abandi (White Supremacy). Mu nyuma yavuze ko abamunegura bahabwa amafaranga n’akarwi k’Abayahudi gakorera mu kinyegero, amajambo asanzwe akorehwa mu kurwanya abayahudi. Mu ntango z’ino ndwi, Ye yatangaje imigambi yiwe yo kwitoreza ikibanza c’umukuru w’igihugu wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 2024. Yaheruka kwiyamamaza mu 2020, ariko yaronse amajwi 70.000 gusa.

column2: Amakuru ku ntambara ya Russia na Ukraine: Uburusiya bugabisha Uburengero ku ngaruka zititezwe
column3: Uburusiya bwagabishije ku mugaragaro Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika - n'ibindi bihugu bicuditse nazo - ku mugambi wavyo wo guha ibirwanisho Ukraine. Iri gabisha ryacishijwe mu rwandiko rw'igisata kijejwe imigenderanire i Moscou, ikopi ikaba yashitse mu minwe y'ibinyamakuru muri Amerika. Uru rwandiko rw'impapuro zibiri - ibiro vy'ubuserukizi vy'Uburusiya i Washington bikaba vyarurungikiye ibiro vy'umunyamabanga wa reta ya Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire  - rugabisha ko ingendo ya Amerika na OTAN/NATO yo kurungika ibirwanisho muri Ukraine "isongera isibe" kuri iyi ngwano ya Ukraine, igashobora gutuma haba ivyo abajejwe imigenderanire b'Uburusiya bita "ingaruka zitari zitezwe". Rwarungitswe ku wa kabiri, igihe bitanguye kumenyekana ko Amerika igomba ihe Ukraine iyindi mfashanyo ya gisirikare. Haciye amasaha makeya gusa, Perezida Joe Biden akaba yaciye atera igikumu kw'itegeko ritanga uburenganzira bwo kurungika  imfashanyo ya gisirikare ingana n'imiriyoni 800 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika - harimwo, ubu bukaba ari bwo bwa mbere,  ibirwanisho rutura birasa kure nk'ivyitwa howitzers - ni mu ntumbero yo guha Ukraine inguvu za gisirikare zingana n'iz'Uburusiya muri ico gihugu. Umutegetsi mukuru wo mu butegetsi bwa Amerika yasubiwemwo avuga ko iri gabisha rishobora gufatwa nk'icemezo c'uko Uburusiya bwemera ko imfashanyo ya Amerika na OTAN kuri Ukraine yabaye ngirakamaro. Igice ca mbere c'iyi mfashanyo citezwe gushika muri Ukraine mu misi mike iri imbere, mu gihe ingabo z'Uburusiya zibandanya kwitegura mu buseruko bw'ico gihugu, imbere y'igitero gikomeye citezwe mu ntara irwanirwa  cane ya Donbas muri Ukraine mu ndwi nkeya ziri imbere. Kuva intambara itanguye, Amerika imaze guha Ukraine imfashanyo ya gisirikare ifise agaciro k'imiriyaridi zirenga zitatu z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine avuga ko ingabo za Ukraine zishika 3000 zimaze gupfa, abarenga 10.000 nabo bakaba bamaze gukomereka kuva igitero gitangura. Yabivugiye mu kiganiro yagiranye n'imboneshakure CNN yo muri Amerika, aho avuga ko abari hagati ya 2500 na 3000 bamaze gupfa, ari naho yaciye agabisha ko Uburusiya bushobora gukora igitero ca nikleyeri. Haraciye ukwezi Zelensky avuze ko ingabo za Ukraine zababa 1500 zari zimaze kuhasiga ubuzima. Ariko, aho hose yama avuga ko Abarusiya basumba kure ivyo bitigiri vy'abamaze gupfa. BBC ubwayo ntirashobora guhinyuza ibi bitigiri bitarimwo abasivire. Impande zompi zama zitangaza ibitigiri vyo ku rundi ruhande vy'abo zimaze kwica - akenshi bikaba ari ivy'umurengera bisumba kure cane ibitangazwa n'urudi ruhande. Isi yoba iritegurira ko Uburusiya bushobora kuzotera Ukraine bukoresheje ikirwanisho ca nikleyeri, nk'uko vyaraye bivuzwe na Perezida Zelensky. Zelensky yari abajijwe na CNN  nimba yari afise ubwoba ku biherutse kuvugwa n'umukuru wa CIA, aho ku wa kane yavuze ko Uburusiya bushobora guhindura amayeri bugakoresha ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri. "Si jewe gusa - ni isi yose, ibihugu vyose bitegerezwa kuba maso kuko ishobora kuba atari inkuru yo, ariko ishobora kuba ari ukuri", niko Zelensky avuga, mu majambo make y'icongereza yakoresheje kugira ngo ashimangire. Abandanya ati: "Ni ngombwa ko twiyumvira aho gutinya, ntidutinye ahubwo twitegure. Ariko ico si ikibazo ca Ukraine - si Ukraine gusa - ariko ni ikibazo c'isi yose, niko nibaza". Mu kwezi guheze, umuvugizi wa Kremlin yavuze ko Uburusiya bushobora kwikora ku birwanisho vya nikleyeri gusa mu gihe vyoboneka ko ukubaho kwabwo kubangamiwe. Zelensky kandi yabajijwe ku bwato rutura bw'intambara bw'Uburusiya bwazamye, buzwi nka Moskva, ariko yariyubaye ku makuru avuga ko ubu bwato bwatewe misire zibiri za ukrane. "Ico tuzi ni uko butakibaho. Kuri twebwe, ni ikirwanisho gikomeye cane kibangamiye igihugu cacu, rero izama ryabwo ntabwo ritubabaje. "Mu gihe Uburusiya bwokehanirwa n'ibirwanisho bukoresha mu kudutera, yoba ari amahirwe kuri twebwe". Mw'ijambo yaraye ashikirije mu masaha yitereye y'ijoro ryakeye, avuga ko bigoye kumenya igihe iyi ntambara izomara. Ati: " Nivyo, ndumva kandi ibitandukanye bivugwa. Mfise amakuru menshi gusumba ibinyamakuru bimwe bimwe ku bijanye n'intumbero n'ubushobozi igisirikare c'Uburusiya gifise. "Ku bijanye na kazoza k'ubutunzi bw'Uburusiya. Kubijanye n'ingene abanyagihugu biyumva mu Burusiya". Avuga ko hari ibintu bibiri bizokwerekana igihe intambara izomara. Avuga ati: "Ingene abasirikare bacu bazovyifatamwo neza ni ikintu gikomeye. "Ni ikintu nyamukuru mu mateka yacu. Ariko ntigikwiye kugira ngo twomore abigaruriye ubutaka bwacu. Ariko tuzobakubita". "Ibihano ku Burusiya ni ikintu gikomeye cane. Bihungabanya ubutunzi. Ariko ntigikwiye kugira ngo igisirikare c'Uburusiya kibure ibikibeshaho. Dukeneye ibirwanisho bikomeye, bishobora kubasambura". Yongerako ati: "Umuntu avuze ati: umwaka canke myaka, nishura nti: intambara urashobora kuyigira nto gusumba. Ni twaronka hakiri kare ibirwanisho binini twasavye, niho tuzogira inguvu kandi niho tuzoshobora kugarukana amahoro vuba". Umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine wazindutse uterwa amabombe nk'uko bivugwa n'umukuru w'igisagara. Mu butumwa yacishije kuri Instagram, Vitali Klitschko yavuze ko aya mabombe yatewe mu karere ka Darnytskyi kari ku nkengera y'igisagara. Yongera ko y'uko igitigiri c'abapfuye n'abakomeretse kitazwi kandi ko abajejwe ibikorwa vy'ubutabazi bari aho vyabereye. Nk'uko vyagenze kuri Kyiv, ibibombe kandi vyumvikanye mu gisagara ca Lyiv kiri mu burengero bwa Ukraine muri aka gatondo. Mu butumwa yacishije kuri app ya Telegram, buramatari Maksym Kozytskyi yavuze ko habaye igitero c'indege hagati y'isaha cumi n'imwe n'iminoa 46 (05:46) n'isaha imwe n'iminota ibiri (07:02 ) mu masaha y'aho muri ico gihugu. Avuga ko abajejwe gucungera ikirere ba Ukraine bariko barakora, ariko akaba atatomoye ku hatewe iyo mabombe, hamwe n'abakomeretse canke bakahasiga ubuzima.

column2: Papa Francis: Gatolika yakoze amakosa mu "gucinyiza imico y'abandi"
column3: Umwungere wa Elkeziya Gatolika, Papa Francis, yavuze ko iryo shengero ryakoze amakosa mu gushimikira ku muco umwe gusa, rimwe na rimwe hakanakoreshwa inguvu mu gushika ku mugambi waryo Papa yavuze yuko ivyo vyahombeje Ishengero ubutunzi butandukanye bwo mu mico n'imigenzo myinshi. Yavuze yuko inyigisho z'ishengero zerekanye yuko hakwiye kwubahirizwa "inkomoko y'umuco n'akaranga vya buri muntu." Ivyo Papa Francis yabivugiye mu mubonano rusangi uba buri wa gatati i Vaticano. Abivuze mu gihe hari umwidogo ku mugabane wa Amerika y'ubumanuko ku vyagizwe igihe Espagne yigarurira ico gice c'isi ikanashira mu bukoroni ba kavukire baho. Kuwa kabiri umukuru w'igisagara ca Mexico mu gihugu ca Mexique yavuze yuko igishusho c'umugore kavukire kizosubirira ica Christopher Columbus (afatwa nk'uwatoye aho umugabane wa Amerika uri) muri kimwe mu bice bikomeye vy'uwo muji.

column2: Amagorwa yo kubaho ufise indwara idasanzwe ituma "ashobora gutabwa nk'akanuka"
column3: Fide Mirón yari afise imyaka 18 igihe atangura kubona ko ariko arahohoterwa n'urunganwe mu gisagara ca Barcelona. Baramwirukanye, bamufata nk'igikinisho, nk'uko we nyene abivuga. Bamuraba nk'agahabwa baravye isura yiwe ingene yari imeze, isura yiwe yahindutse kubera indwara izwi kw'izina rya porphyrie érythropoïétique congénitale. Iyo ni indwara idasanzwe idakunze kwibonekeza ariko mbi cane, yanduye kuva akiri uruhinja. Haciye imyaka 15, Fide yahawe ubutumwa budasanzwe. Bwari buvuye kuri umwe mu bahora bamutyekeza, ariko asaba imbabazi ku nyifato y'ubwana - nk'uko wenyene abivuga ubu - yerekanye kuri we igihe yari mu myaka y'ubuyabaga. Uyu nyene kwigaya yaributse Fide igihe yariko atanga ikiganiro ku banyamakuru aho yavuze ko yarwanije uyu muntu yari fafashwe n'indwara ico gihe yitwa Günther. Ariko rero ntakunda kuvuga "ivyamubayeko muri kahise". Ntaco bikivuze kuri we. Ikimuha ingoga ni uko ubuzima bwiwe bwitaweho cane mbere n'utwigoro tukaba turiko turakorwa kugira ngo haboneke inyishu canke umuti wo gushobora kugabanya ingaruka z'indwara yiwe. Ni indwara mbi cane. Yonona igitigu (umwijima mu Kinyarwanda), igatuma umuntu akama amaraso, akagira ibisebe ku ruhu. Ibihimba vy'umubiri birabora gushika aho bikoroka, arico gituma bayita 'porphyria mutilante'. Mirón ubu afise imyaka 46, uku niko asigura ubuzima bwiwe bwose. Iyi ndwara irababaza cane. Ibisebe vyatanguye kwibonekeza afise amezi atandatu gusa, akiri uruhinja. Abavyeyi banje barantwaye kwa muganga, ariko ico gihe nta bintu vyinshi vyari bizwi kuri ino ndwara. Ico bambwiye conyene ni izina ryayo. Nta muti wari ho - mbere gushika n'ubu ntawubaho - kandi gushika ubu nta wuzi nimba uzoteba uboneka. Ati: "Ikintu conyene cari kizwi ni uko yari indwara ikomeye cane, vyumvikana ko ntari gushobora kubaho mu buzima busanzwe nk'ubw'abandi. "Vyari ngombwa ko ngerageza kwirinda ico cose cotuma nsinzikara, nategerezwa kwirinda kuja ku zuba. "Kubera ko iyi ndwara yanteye gukama amaraso, nakenera guhabwa amaraso buri minsi 15. Mu bwana bwanje bwose namye mpabwa aya maraso. "Iyi ndwara yaza nk'ikiza, uko bukeye uko bwije. Uko navyuka mu gitondo niko nasanga haje igikomere gishasha. Kubera ibikomere naracitse ibikonjo, isura yanje irasibangana. Bwari ububabare budahera, burenze urugero, bubabaza umutima." Ku myaka 14, niho umubiri wiwe wahagarika ivyo kwama aterwa amaraso. Indwara yarahagaze. Ariko ntaho yagiye, ni nk'uko yabaye imuhaye akaruhuko. "Ububabare burabandanya, ariko ntabwo bikomeye nko mu bwana bwanje. Iriyadukiza." Isura yisa "Si nsa n'abandi kubera ingaruka z'iyi ndwara. Ziribonekeza. Ndazi neza ko zishobora kuntuma ntabwa nk'akanuka. "Ariko ibi ntaco bimbwiye. "Umuntu wese yashatse kumenya uwo ndi we aranzi ingene meze n'ico nshoboye. "Umuntu wese yagumanye n'umurwayi Fide yarabonye ko ubu buzima n'ububabare nagize vyampaye inguvu. "Nivyo koko narababaye cane igihe iyo miyabaga i Barcelona bariko barantyekeza. "Umuntu arigira uw'ejo agafata ko ata n'umwe ariko aramuraba. Ku muhingamo w'uyo munsi narabaye igikinisho ciwe. "Ariko ivyo ni ibisanzwe, ni ikintu gito cane c'ubwana, ariko kubona inyuma y'imyaka myinshi yubahutse kunsaba imbabazi biranezereye cane. Nta nyishu Akomeza ati: "Ikintu kibi cane ntabwo ari ububabare umuntu yumva, ni irungu. Ntabwo nshaka kuvuga irungu ry'ukuba uri ukwawe, oya, ahubwo ni irungu ryo kubura inyishu, ukabura n'abakwereka inzira wofata. "Mfise abaganga banshigikira, ariko ntabwo higeze haboneka umuti nyawo. "Ni ibihe biremereye cane rwose kandi bibabaza, iyo wumva ko inzira zose zugaye kandi utagira iyo uja. "Iyo mbajije inyishu, numva umengo ndiko ntera ingorane. Ikibazo canje kiragoye cane kandi kubera ko twese tugenda twihuta, rimwe na rimwe twitaho gusa ibintu twibaza ko dushobora gutorera umuti. "Si benshi bameze nkanje." Yongera ati: "Kuva nkiri muto natanguye kurondera abandi bantu boba bameze nkanje kugira ngo duhimirize ubushakashatsi mu ntumbero yo kurondera umuti. "Hari umwe nashoboye gutora muri Cuba, uwundi muri Brezili, uwundi muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. "Ndafise abantu umunani bari muri Espanye. Nka bose bameze neza, ariko mu ci riheze hari umugenzi yapfuye. "Indwara yiwe yahavuye imera nabi. Ntushobora kumenya uko ibintu bizogenda. "Nico gituma ubu nitayeho cane kuyerekana no kurondera inyishu. "Kimwe mu vyo nashoboye gushikako mu bushakashatsi nakoze, ni uko nashoboye guhura na muganga Millet maze dutangura urugendo rwo kurondera umuti. "Iyi nzira iriko iratanga umwimbu kuko mu myaka ibiri iheze hashoboye kuboneka umuti ukora kuri ino ndwara. "Waramaze kwemzwa n'ikigo c'ubuvuzi c'i Burayi (European Medicines Agency) ubu turindiriye ko bawukorera igerageza mu buvuzi kugira ngo turabe ingaruka zawo ku barwayi." Ni inzira itanga umwizero. "Umuryango wanje wambereye ubuzima bwanje. Papa yampaye amaraso nari nkeneye kugira ngo nshobore kubandanya mbaho, ariko maze kugera ku myaka icenda yarapfuye ahitanywe n'isanganya ry'umuduga. Urupfu rwiwe rwaradukozeko twese, ariko cane cane jewe. "Inkingi y'amagara yanje yari isenyutse ni umuntu yampaye amaraso yiwe. "Ubuzima ni amazi. Uno munsi uriho ariko ejo nturiho. Nategerezwa kurwana kugira ngo nshobore kubandanya mbaho. "Ku rundi ruhande, mama yamye anshigikira kandi yikoreye umuzigo munini w'indwara yanje. Ni umuntu akomeye cane kandi ntiyigeze ahengeshanya kunyitaho. "Ubu ntegerezwa kwitaho ubuzima bwanje gusumba, ariko iyo ndonse akanya ndakunda gutembera, nkabonana n'abantu kugira ngo nsangire ivyiyumviro nabo. "Ubu ubuzima bwanje bwarahindutse. Nk'umugore akiri muto, sinashoboye kwiga kubera uburakari bw'iyi ndwara n'imiti yayo ibabaza cane, ariko natanguye igikorwa co kwigisha abantu. "Ikinti ico ari co cose kiba mu buzima gitanga icigwa kanaka. "Numva umengo nshobora kuguruka".

column2: Urukino rwa Arsenal-Manchester City ntirwerekanwa kuri TV y'Ubushinwa kubera Mesut Ozil
column3: Televiziyo y'Ubushinwa CCTV yafashe ingingo y'ukutekerana urukino rwa Arsenal na Manchester City inyuma y'amajambo yashikirijwe n'umukinyi wa Arsenal Mesut Ozil, nk'uko bimenyeshwa n'ikinyamakuru ca leta. Mu butumwa yacishije ku rubuga hwaniro, Ozil yariyamirije ugufatwa nabi kw'aba Isilamu bo mu karere ka Uighur mu Bushinwa. Umurwi wa Arsenal wasohoye itangazo aho witandukanya n'amajambo yavuzwe n'uyo mukinyi akomoka mu Budagi, uvuga ko "ari ishirahamwe ridaharanira inyungu za politike". Ikinyamakuru c'u Bushinwa The Global Times  cavuze ko ayo majambo ya Ozil ari "ibinyoma" kandi ko "yahemukiye" abajejwe urukino rw'umupira w'amaguru. Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bushinwa ryamenyesheje ko ivyavuzwe na Ozil "bidashobora kwihanganirwa" kandi ko yababaje "abakunzi ba Arsenal" mu Bushinwa. CCTV yaciye ifata ingongo yo kwerekana urukino rwa Tottenham na Wolves, aho kwerekana urukino rwa Arsenal iza kwakira Man City isanzwe ifise igikombe c'ihiganwa ry'u Bwongereza. Muri ayo majambo yacishije ku rubuga hwaniro, Ozil, asanzwe ari umunywanyi w'idini rya Isilamu, yavuze ko aba isilamu ba Uighur ari "abarwanyi bariko barwanya ihohotera bakorerwa". Aranegura kandi Ubushinwa n'abandi ba Isilamu avuga ko bigira sindabibazwa ku ngorane abo ba Isilamu barimwo. Ubushinwa bubandanya buhakana ko butariko burahohotera aba Isilamu ba Uighur. Amashirahamwe aharanira agateka ka muntu avuga ko abantu bababa umuliyoni - hafi bose bagizwe n'aba Isilamu ba Uighur - bapfungiwe mu mabohero acungerewe cane kandi ata rubanza baciriwe. Ubushinwa buvuga ko ahubwo bari mu bigo aho bariko bahabwa inyigisho ngo bashobore  kurwanya indyane zishingiye ku madini. Mu kwezi kw'icumi, ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaboko rya Amerika, NBA, ryarahuye n'ibibazo vy'ubutunzi inyuma y'aho umwe mu barongoye imirwi ya NBA yandikiye amajambo ku rubuga ntangamakuru yatosekaje imigenderanire n'Ubushinwa. Daryl Morey, umukuru w'umurwi Houston Rockets, yanditse kuri Twitter avuga ko ashigikiye imyiyerekano y'ukurondera ubwigenge muri Hong Kong. Ayo majambo yatumye amakompanyi y'Ubushinwa ahagarika imfashanyo zayo  be n'amasezerano yerekeye kwerekana inkino z'umupira w'amaboko ku ma televiziyo.

column2: Pep Guardiola: Amahirwe Liverpool imaze kwiha ararengeye Man City
column3: Umumenyereza wa Manchester City, Pep Guardiola, avuga ko ivyo guhiganirwa igikombe ca Premier League vyaheze nyuma yo gutsindwa 3-2 na Wolves ejo kuwa gatanu. City ni iya gatatu muri Premier League, ikaba irushwa na Liverpool ya mbere amanota 14 ikaba kandi iri inyuma ya Leicester City inota rimwe. Abajijwe niba guhiganirwa igikombe vyaheze, Guardiola yabariye BBC Radio 5 Live ati: "Ubudasa bw'amanota ni bunini cane, rero ni ego". City iramaze gutsindwa imikino itanu muri Premier League mu mahiganwa y'ubu, ukaba ari umukino umwe wiyongerako imaze gutsindwa ugereranije n'amahiganwa ya 2018-19. Barusha Liverpool umikino umwe, kandi yoyo imaze gutakaza amanota abiri gusa mu mahiganwa y'ubu. Kuva mu kwezi kwa gatatu Liverpool iramaze gutsinda imikino 26 mu mikino 27, ikaba isigaje imikino ibiri kugira imare umwaka wose idatsinzwe ku rwego rwo hejuru. Guardiola yongeyeko ati "Kwoba ari nko kurota twiyumviriye Liverpool, ahubwo twiyumvira Leicester.  Turafise amahirwe yo kuronka ikibanza ca kabiri. Ndazi ko ikipe yanje ishoboye, ariko ni uko bimeze." Umukinyi akina mu mpande, Bernardo Silva yongeyeko ati: "Ni ukuri ibintu kuri twebwe bimeze nabi. Uyu mwaka watugendeye nabi cane. Nta n'umwe yaziga ko twari kwenurirwa na Liverpool nk'uku kandi ihiganwa rikiri hagati. "Dutegerezwa kubandanya. Turazi yuko gutwara igikombe bigoye cane. Sinovuga ko bidashoboka ariko biragoye cane."

column2: Ukraine: Ingabo ziri i Severodonetsk zishobora guta zikomoka mu gihe iza Russia ziriko zisatira
column3: Ingabo za Ukraine zirashobora kuva mu gisagara kinini co mu buseruko, Severodonetsk, mu gihe  ingabo z'Uburusiya ziri hafi kukigota, nk'uko bivugwa n'umutegtsi. Serhiy Haidai, buramatari wa Luhansk, avuga ko ingabo z'Uburusiya ziri mu gice kimwe c'iki gisagara. "Birashobora ko, kugira ngo ntibahave bugaranwa, ari ngombwa ko bavayo". Kwigarurira akarere kose ka Donbas nico cabaye intumbero nyamukuru y'iyi ntambara ku Burusiya . Ukraine iriko iratabaza isaba ibirwanisho birasa kure kugira ngo ishobore guhangana n'Uburusiya bubandanya busatira, ariko gushika ubu Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ntizirashobora kuyibiha. Ejo ku wa gatanu, umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson yavuze ko Ukraine ikeneye ibirwanisho birasa kure kandi bitera ibisasu vyinshi ica rimwe. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Bloomberg ati: "Mfise ubwoba ko Putin, ku giciro kinini kuri we no ku gisirikare c'Uburusiya, abandanya atema atongora i Donbas". "Kumbure afise kuba ata kintu kiboneka arashikako, ariko abandanya atera intambwe buke buke, rero ni ngombwa ko tubandanya dufasha igisirikare ca Ukraine". I Severodonetsk, Haidai avuga ko inzu zirenga igice zasenyuwe kandi ko inyubakwa hafi zose zononywe, abayagihugu basigayeyo bari mu kangaratete. Ibarabara riva muri ico gisagara rija hagati muri Ukraine riracari mu masasu y'urutavanako, ariko rirarengana, nk'uko abivuga. Hanyuma kandi, ingabo zishigikiwe n'Uburusiya zarigaruriye igisagara ca Lyman kiri mu burengero bwa Severodonetsk, ibi bikazishoboza guca zibandanya gushika mu bisagara bikuru bikuru vya Slovyansk na  Kramatorsk. N'umunyamakuru  Paul Kirby Gufata Lyman ni ikintu gikomeye ku ngabo zishigikiwe n'Uburusiya zigenda zisatira bukebuke mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Urugamba rwo kurwanira iki gisagara ntirwari rworoshe, n'aho ingabo za Ukraine zari zatanguye gukura meza mu ntango z'ino ndwi. Ni iyindi ntzinsi ikomeye ku Burusiya muri ino ndwi, inyuma y'aho bufatiye Svitlodarsk mu bumanuko. Lyman ubwayo si igisagara kinini, ariko giha akaryo ingabo zishigikiwe n'Uburusiya kugenura ibarabara rikomeye riva mu buseruko rija mu burengero. Bisigura kandi ko ubu zigeze ku birometero 20 uvuye mu gisagara ca Slovyansk, utera uja mu bumanuko bushira uburengero. Izindi ntambara zikomeye ziri kure mu buseruko, aho ingabo z'Uburusiya zisugereje ibisagara bibiri vya  Severodonetsk na Lysychansk. Ibi ni ibisagara bikomeye muri aka karere-mutima k'amahinguriro ka Ukraine kazwi nka Donbas, kugatakaza rukaba rwoba ari uruhombo rukomeye ku gisirikare. Hanze y'urubuga rw'intambara, Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya yagirije Ukraine "gutoba" umugambi w'amahoro mu kiganiro yagiranye kuri terefone n'umukuru wa reta (Chancelier/Chansellor)  ya Autriche/Austria Karl Nehammer. Mu mpapuro zasohowe na Moscou zerekana ivyo bavuganye muri ico kiganiro, Putin arahakana ivyo igihugu ciwe cagirizwa ko ari co gituma imfungurwa zikena kw'isi kubera cazibiye ibivuko vya Ukraine, akavuga ko ahubwo ubu bukene buva ku bihano Amerika n'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya vyafatiye Uburusiya. Ishirahamwe ONU riragabisha ko igitero c'Uburusiya gishobora guteza ikibazo c'imfungurwa kw'isi gishobora kumara imyaka myinshi. Caratumye intete zishorwa hanze, nk'ibigori n'ingano, co kimwe n'amavuta yo guteka bigabanuka, ivyatumye n'ibiciro vy'ibifungurwa vyo kubisubiriza biduga cane. Ibiciro vy'ibifungurwa ku rwego rw'isi vyaduze hafi kugera ku rugero rwababa 30% ibegeranije n'igihe nk'iki co mu mwaka uheze, nk'uko bivugwa na ONU. Hagati aho, ishami ry'Ishengero rya Orthodox rya Ukraine i Moscou rivuga ko rihagaritse ubucuti n'Uburusiya kubera Ishengero rya Orthodox ry'Uburusiya rishigikiye iyi ntambara. Mw'itangazo iri shengero ryasohoye, rivuga riti: "Turahakanye aho Kirill, umukuru w'ishengero i Moscou, [ Patriarch Kirill of Moscow] ahagaze... kuri iyi ntambara". Ukraine ifise ikibanza kidasanzwe mw'Ishengero rya Orthodox ry'Uburusiya kandi ifise inyubakwa zikomeye. Igice kimwe c'ishengero rya Orthodox rya Ukraine ryari ryamaze guhagarika ubucuti na Moscou mu 2019.

column2: Umupasitori aregwa gusambanya umukenyezi ku nguvu muri Nigeria yatanze imihoho mu mabanga yo kurongora ishengero.
column3: Uyo mupastori asayangana , Biodun Fatoyinbo yari amaze imisi avugwa mu makuru iyi misi itatu iheze, inyuma yaho umukenyezi azwi cane mu gufata amafoto amwagiririje ko yamusambanije ku nguvu incuro zibiri imbere y'uko ashikana imyaka cumi n'umunani, haheze imyaka irenga cumi. Uyo mu pastori w'ishengero bita COZA rikundwa cane mu gisagara Abuja yanditse ku rubuga ngurukana bumenyi rwa Instagram kuri uyu musi wa mbere  ko yatanze imihoho mu mabanga yiwe kubera iyo nkuru yavuzwe cane. Hari abari bakoze  imyiyerekano mu mpera z'iyindwi mu bisagara bikuru bibiri vy'igihugu ca Nigeria arivyo Lagos na  Abuja. Basabira  ubutungane Busola Dakolo inyuma yaho amasanamu y'uwo mukenyezi  akwiragirijwe cane  ku mbuga  ngurukana bumenyi , avuga ko uyo mupastori yamusambanije ku nguvu. Uyo mu pastori wewe arabihakana. Igipolisi camenyesheje ko kitaramenya ibirego umukenyezi Dakolo yagirije uyo mu pastori  kandi ko ata muntu n'umwe arashikana ibirego nk'ivyo imbere y'ababijejwe. Igihugu ca Nigeria gifise abapastori benshi b'amasengero yemera Kristu y'abapentekoti, bamwe mu bapastori bakunze kwagirizwa kugira  inyifato itabereye.

column2: China: Rurangiranwa mu kuvuza piano Li Yundi yapfunzwe yagirizwa kugura imaraya
column3: Rurangiranwa mu kuvuza piano mu Bushinwa, Li Yundi, apfunzwe azira gusambana n'imaraya, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru ca reta. Ku rubuga hwaniro, igipolisi canditse ko umugabo w'imyaka 39 hamwe n'imaraya y'imyaka 29, bemeye ko bakoze ibintu bitemewe n'amategeko. Bafashwe inyuma y'aho abanyagihugu batangiye iyo nkuru ku bategetsi. Mu gihe igipolisi kitashize ahabona izina ryiwe, ikinyamakuru ca reta mu nyuma cemeje ko ari Li. Iyo nkuru yababaje abakunzi benshi b'uwo mugabo azwi kw'izina rya "China Piano Prince". Ku myaka 18, Li yabaye umuntu wa mbere akiri muto avuza piano - ahawe agashimwe ka mbere gakomeye mpuzamakungu ka Chopin Piano Competition mu 2000. Yabandanije avuza piano hirya no hino kw'isi, akaba n'umuntu azwi cane mu bantu bavuga ururimi rw'igishinwa. Umuntu umwe yanditse ku rubuga hwaniro rwa Weibo rumeze nka Twitter ati:"Mana yanje, biratangaje. Uyu ni Li Yundi twese dutangarira?" Abandi berekana amakenga ku kuntu yafashwe. Undi yanditse ngo:"Mfise amakenga yo kumenya ingene abantu bamenye ko ari we. Ubonye umugabo w'imyaka 39 n'umugore w'imyaka 29 binjiye mu nzu bari kumwe, bigenda gute ngo abantu bamenye ko ari imaraya, na we ari umukiriya wiwe?" Inyuma y'aho iyo nkuru imenyekaniye, ishirahamwe ry'abanyamuziki mu Bushinwa ryavuze ko rigiye kwaka ubunywanyi Li kuko "atanga isura mbi cane mu bantu". Bamwe mu baraba ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko ipfungwa ryiwe rishobora gufatwa nk'igabishwa ku nyifato mbi y'abandi ba rurangiranwa mu gihe Ubushinwa bwahagurukiye abakora akazi kerekeye umuziki. Mu mategeko yo mu Bushinwa, abasambana canke bagurisha imaraya bashobora gupfungwa gushika ku misi 15 bakanatangisha n'amande ashobora gushika ku madolari ya amerika 782.

column2: EU: Indangamuntu ya Covid-19 yoba isigura iki ku ngenzi?
column3: Indangamuntu nshasha ya Covid mw'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya (EU), Digital Covid Certificate/Certificat COVID numérique - "indangamuntu" y'iri shirahamwe yerekana ko waronse urucanco - iriko iratanguzwa hose mu bihugu 27 vy'iri shirahamwe. Ni nde ayifitiye uburenganzira, yoba isigura iki ku ngenzi? Ni uburyo bw'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya bwerekana ko abanyagihugu: Ibihugu vyose 27 vy'iri shirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya - co kimwe no mu bihugu vy'Ubuswisi, Iceland/Islande, Norvège na  Liechtenstein - birayifise kandi birayemera. Itangwa ku buntu - kandi abanyagihugu ba EU, co kimwe n'abanyamahanga baba muri ibi bihugu vya EU mu mategeko (bakaba bafise uburenganzira bwo gutembera mu bindi bihugu vyo muri iri shirahamwe) bashobora kuyivoma (download) bakayigumana kuri ngendanwa zabo, canke barakonswa urukaratasi rw'ikopi. Hari ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyari vyamaze gutangura kuyikoresha ku gushaka kwavyo - ariko rero ku wa 01 z'uku kw'indwi niho yatanguzwa icese, mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu. Izoba ifise code QR hamwe n'urupfunguruzo nyabwonko (digital signature key/clé de signature numérique) umuntu yisangije, ibi bikazoshoboza umuntu kwinjira mu bubiko yisangije burimwo amakuru yose ajanye n'incanco yaronse - nk'akarorero ibitaro, ikigo canke urwego rwamuhaye uru rucanco. Amakuru y'umuntu yisangije azoguma kuri iyi ndangamuntu yiwe, ntazobikwa canke ngo agumanwe, nk'akarorero ku kibuga c'indege, mu gihe bazoba bahejeje guhinyuza ko ari ay'ukuri. Abantu barizeye ko iyi ndangamuntu izokworohereza ingenzi gutembera mu bihugu vy'ishiramahwe EU. Ntabwo ari igitabo c'inzira - ingenzi izotegerezwa kuba igifise canke urundi rukaratasi urwo ari rwo rwose rwerekana ibiyiranga. Gusa, umuntu uwo ari we wese azoba afise iyi ndangamuntu, mu bisanzwe azoba arekuriwe kwinjira mu gihugu ico ari co cose atarinze gupimwa canke kubanza gutaramurwa mu kiringo kanaka. Si co kimwe - ariko zompi zerekana amakuru amwe kandi zifise intumbero imwe yo kwerekana ingene umuntu ahagaze ku bijanye na Covid. Ishirahamwe EU ntiriremeza Covid Pass, ariko ibihugu ku gatwe kavyo, nk'akarorero Ubugiriki na Espagne, biramaze kuyemera. EU ivuga ko iriko irakora uko ishoboye kwose kugira ngo iyi ndangamuntu ise n'izindi z'ibihugu bitari muri EU. Mu bisanzwe nta ngorane ihari. Hari incanco zine zose zemewe mu Bwongereza no mu bihugu vyo muri EU  - gusa hari zitatu mu zemewe mu Bwongereza rimwe na rimwe zizwi ku mazina atandukanye, ariko ni zimwe. Muri EU: Ariko, Oxford-AstraZeneca (AZ) yahinguwe n'ikigo Serum Institute co mu Buhindi (SII) ifise irindi zina rigira gatatu - Covishield. N'aho ari co kimwe n'iyo yahinguriwe i Bulaya, ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya ntiriyemera. None hari ingorane kubona Covishield itemewe ku mugabane wa Bulaya? Covishield irakoreshwa cane mu bihugu bikenye biciye muri wa mugambi mpuzamakungu w'incanco uzwi nka Covax, ubu hakaba hari impungenge ko iyi ndangamuntu ya Bulaya ishobora kutemera ingenzi ziva muri ivyo bihugu. Ikigo ca Bulaya kijejwe imiti, European Medicines Agency/Agence européenne des médicaments (EMA) ntigitegerezwa kubanza kwemeza ikigo c'Ubuhindi gihingura Oxford-AstraZeneca, kubera ata ncanco ziva muri ico gihugu zinjira muri EU. Ariko ikigo Serum Institute kivugwa ko coba kibanza gusaba uruhusha muri EU kugira ngo gishobore guhingura Covishield. Ikigo AstraZeneca kandi kivuga ko kiriko kirakorana na EMA kugira ngo barabe ko "Covishield nayo yokwemerwa kuja muri izi ndangamuntu z'incanco". Gusa EMA ivuga ko gushika ubu itarigera ironka igisabo ico ari co cose kirondera ko uru rucanco rwemerwa. N'ubwo uru rucanco rutemewe gukoreshwa mw'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya, ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu OMS ryaremeje ko rushobora gukoreshwa mu buryo bwihutirwa - kandi n'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya rivuga ko ibihugu vyaryo ku giti cavyo bishobora kwemerera ingenzi kwinjira mu gihe bahawe urucanco rwa Covishield. Hanyuma kandi, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyari bisanzwe vyemera izindi ncanco - nk'akarorero Ubugiriki buremera urucanco rw'Ubushinwa Sinovac, urucanco rw'Uburusiya Sputnik V hamwe n'izindi zitari nke. Urwego rukuru rushinzwe amagara y'abantu muri Afrika ruranegura cane ingingo y'Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya yo gukura ku rutonde ingenzi zahawe incanco za AstraZeneca zakorewe mu Buhindi mu mugambi w'iyi ndangamuntu ya Covid. Umukuru w'ikigo ca Afrika kijejwe kurwanya indwara Centres for Disease Control and Prevention, John Nkengasong, avuga ko ingingo y'Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya itisunze ubuhinga n'amakuru yerekana ingene incanco zakorewe mu Buhindi zihagaze, kandi ata cerekana ko zidakora neza uzigereranije n'iza Bulaya.

column2: Umugambi wa UK wo kurungika abimukira mu Rwanda uteye kubiri 'na kamere y'Imana' - Welby
column3: Umukuru w'ishengero ry'Ubwongereza (Church of England), Justin Welby, kuri uyu wa Mungu yaneguye umugambi wa Reta y'Ubwongereza wo kurungika mu Rwanda abarondera ubuhungiro. Uyu Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury avuga ko uwu mugambi "uteye kubiri na kamere y'Imana". Mu nyigisho yiwe ya Pasika, Justin Welby yavuze ko igihe c'izuka rya Yesu Kristu/Yesu Kristo atari ico "kuremeka inshingano zacu abandi". Reta ivuga ko ari ngombwa ko haba impinduka kugira bakingire ubuzima bw'abantu ntibagurishwe.l Muri uwu mugambi w'imiriyoni 120 z'amapadundi (hafi imiriyoni 157 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika)  - watangajwe muri ino ndwi - abantu bafatwa ko binjiye mu Bwongereza bidaciye mu mategeko bazotwarwa muri iki gihugu c'Urwanda, ari ho bazokwemererwa gusabira uburenganzira bwo kuja kuba muri ico gihugu. Iyi ngingo iriyamirizwa bikomeye, aho amashirahamwe atabara abatishoboye arenga 160 ariko asaba abashikiranganji guhagarika ico bita poritike "y'ubugome". Eka n'imigambwe itavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi mu Bwongereza na bamwe mu bagendera ku vyiyumviro vya kera (Conservatives) baranegura iyi ngingo. Mw'ijambo yashikirije ku Rusengero rukuru rwa Canterbury kuri uno musi wa Mungu wa Pasika, Musenyeri Welby yavuze ko  hari "ibibazo bikomeye bitewe n'irungikwa ry'abasaba ubuhungiro mu mahanga". Yongerako ati: "Ibisigaye ni ivya poritike n'abanyaporitike. Ica ngenderwako n'uko vyoba ari vyiza mu maso y'Imana. Ariko siko bimeze. " ...kandi ntibihuye n'inshingano zacu nk'igihugu kigendera ku ndangagaciro k'aba-Kristu: kuko kuremeka abandi inshingano zacu, naho hoba ari ku gihugu kirondera ineza nk'Urwanda, ni igihushane ca kamere k'Imana, kuko yo nyene ubwayo yaremeye kwiremeka ibitunanira". Ubushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati yashigikiye uwu mugambi bufatiye ku majambo yo kunegura yavuzwe n'uyu musenyeri, bukavuga ko Ubwongereza "bwishimira kahise kabwo" ko gufasha abo bose babikeneye, kandi ko n'imigambi yo guha ubuhungiro ababukeneye wafashije ibihumbi amajana n'amajana kuronka "inzira nziza kandi zemewe n'amategeko zo kwubaka kazoza kabo". Umuvugizi w'ubwo bushikiranganji avuga ati: "Hagati aho, isi irahanzwe n'ikibazo c'abimukira ku rugero rutari bwigere rubaho rero hakenewe impinduka kugira ngo abantu babi bashora abantu bareke gushira ubuzima bw'abantu mu kaga hanyuma n'ikibazo c'abarondera ubuhungiro kw'isi cananiraye gitorerwe umuti". Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati buvuga ko Urwanda "rutekanye" kandi ko ruzokwiga abasaba ubuhungiro hisunzwe amategeko mpuzamakungu akingira uburenganzira bwa kiremwamuntu. Amasendika y'abakozi ba reta avuga ko iyi ngingo ari "iy'ubunyamaswa" ariko ko abategetsi bazotegerezwa kuyishira mu ngiro canke naho bakagenda. Ku wa kane, Ubwongereza n'Urwanda vyashize ahabona amasezerano mashasha azotuma bamwe mu barondera ubuhungiro bazoronswa gusa itike y'indege yo kugenda bakaja muri ico gihugu.
