column2: Yegereyegere "Kwa Siyoni": Abajejwe iryo soko ntibavuga rumwe n'abarikoreramwo
column3: Abadandariza mw'isoko rya Bujumbura City Market rizwi nko kwa Siyoni barahagaritse ibikorwa vyabo kuva kuri uyu wa kabiri biyamiriza iduzwa ry'amahera yo kuriha ibibanza bakoreramwo  gushika ku ncuro zibiri. Ariko abajejwe iryo soko, bavuga yuko ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe uravye ibihe tugezemwo n'uburyo bwakoreshejwe mu kuvugurura isoko. Umupfasoni umwe muri abo badandaza bavuganye na BBC atashimye kwivuga izina, avuga ko bandikiwe amakete abamenyesha ko kuva itariki 10 z'ukwezi kwa mbere 2022 amahera bahora bariha yadugijwe incuro zibiri. Agira ati: "Batumenyesheje ko kubera ibikorwa vyakozwe muri iryo soko, ko kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere amahera twahora turiha azohinduka. Akarorero abahora bariha ibihumbi 400 ku kwezi bazoriha ibihumbi 750, abahora bariha na bo 188.800 bakazoriha 312.000. Urumva ko bagwijije incuro zibiri zirenga." Ivyo bikorwa bivugwa vyakozwe ngo ni nko kwubaka ahahagarara imiduga, gusiga isima hasi hamwe n'amabombo (robine) azana amazi mu ntumbero yo kwikingira ikiza Covid-19. Abadandariza muri  iyo soko bavuga ko batanka ko ibiciro vyoduga, ariko bagasaba ko habanza kuba inama n'ingingo. BBC yashoboye kuvugana n'uburongozi bw'iryo soko, uwitwa Joseph Dukundane atubwira yuko baravye igihe cari kihaciye amahera ataduzwa kandi ibintu vyarazimvye, hamwe n'ibikorwa vyo kuvugurura isoko baranguye, ngo ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe: Kanda ngaha wumve ico kiganiro.

column2: Arteta: Umumenyereza wa Arsenal afise umujinya inyuma y'aho Liverpool ibakubitiye 3-0 muhira
column3: Mikel Arteta avuga ko ari mu "mubabaro" akavuga ko ingene Arsenal yavyifashemwo mu gutsindirwa  muhira 3-0 na Liverpool ari "ibintu bidashobora kwihanganirwa". Uyu murwi w'Abarashi (The Gunners) nk'uko biyita warakubiswe bimwe bibi mu guterwa ibitsindo bitatu vyose mu gice ca kabiri c'urukino, Liverpool ikaba yarerekanye ko yisubije itoto inyuma y'imisi itari mike iri mu bibazo. Mu gihe hasigaye inkino umunani ngo ihiganwa rirangire, Arsenal iri inyuma amanota icenda yose kugira ngo ishobore gushika muri zine za mbere zifise uburenganzira bwo kuja muri rya higanywa rya Buraya rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League/Ligue des Champions). Arteta ati: "Baradusumbije kabisa muri vyose. Vyose vyamvuyeko". "Turasaba imbabazi ku bantu baco n'abafana bacu". Arsenal, umurwi wigeze kuba rurangiranwa, uzwi ko mu mwaka wa 2003/2004 watsindiye ihiganwa utigeze utakaza urukino na rumwe, iri mu kibanza c'icenda mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza, biboneka ko amahirwe yonyene isigaranye kugira ngo ishobore kuja muri Champions League, ni uko itsindira ihiganwa rya Europa League. Arsenal iheruka gukina muri Champions League mu 2016/2017, kuva ico gihe irirabira kure. Ku wa kane, izokwakira umurwi Slavia Prague wo muri Tchéquie (canke République tchèque/ Czech Republic) mu rukino rwa mbere rw'igice ca kane gishira ica nyuma muri  Europa League. Arteta asaba abakinyi biwe guhagarara rugabo inyuma y'amarorerwa baraye bakorewe na Liverpool. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru inyuma y'urukino, Arteta yavuze ati: "Uno musi wari umubabaro mwinshi cane mu murwi. Ubu ndababaye cane kuko ni ibintu ntari niteze". "Ni ukuri ibi bintu ntibigasubire. Nishize mu kibanza c'umurwi n'abakunzi bawo, ibi ntibishobora kwihanganirwa. Ni ngombwa ko duhaguruka". "Ntegerezwa gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo nsubize ibintu mu buryo. Uno musi ibintu ntivyari vyifashe neza na gato". Jermaine Jenas,yahoze akina hagati muri Tottenham no mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza aranegura ubuhinga Arteta yakoresheje. Ati: "Narorereye umurwi utari wizeye ubuhinga bwa Mikel Arteta". "Vyaboneka ko abakinyi ba Arsenal batari bamerewe neza. Basa n'uko ata shaka bari bafise ryo gukina canke ryo kurondera umupira canke ryo kurondera kwinjiza ibitsindo". "Ndiko ndibaza umubabaro abakunzi ba Arsenal bafise ubu". "Ni kangahe tubona Arsenal batakaza imipira inyuma bagaca batsindwa? Ubu ibintu bisigaye biteye isoni".

column2: Covax: Côte d'Ivoire na Ghana vyatanguye gutanga incanco zo gukinga Covid
column3: Ibihugu vya Africa vyatanguye gutera  incanco za Covid zatanzwe biciye ku rwego rwo gukora kugira incanco zisabikanywe kw'isi ata buryarya. Cote d'Ivoire ni kimwe mu bihugu vyaronkejwe izo ncanco zitangwa n'urwego rushigikiwe na ONU COVAX, aho gucanca  kwatanguye ku wa mbere. Na Ghana izotanguza isekeza ryo gucanca muri iyi ndwi. Umukuru wa Ghana, Nana Akufo-Addo kuri uyu wa mbere niwe yabaye uwa mbere mu kuronka urwo rucanco rwa coronavirus ruciye muri iyo nzira. Akufo-Addo yahimirije abanyagihugu kwiteza incanco no kwirinda abashira  amakenga kuri iyo gahunda, izotuma hasohoka incanco ibihumbi 600 za Oxford-AstraZeneca mu gihugu cose kuva ku wa kabiri. Yavuze ati: "Ni ngombwa ko ntanga akarorero ko uru rucanco ata ngorane ruteye mu kuba uwa mbere mu kuruhabwa,kugira uwari we wese muri Ghana yumve ko atekaniwe mu kuruterwa". Mu ntango hazobanza kuvurwa abafise amahirwe mabi menshi yo kwandura-abarenza imyaka 60 canke basanganywe izindi ndwara - hamwe n'abakozi ba nkenerwa cane, nk'abo kwa muganga, abigisha, abaporisi mbere n'abamenyeshamakuru bamwe bamwe. Ariko abagore bafise inda n'abari munsi y'imyaka 18 ntibarabwa n'iryo sekeza ryo gucandaga. Abategetsi bavuga ko badafise amakuru akwiye ku ngaruka z'urwo rucanco kuri iyo migwi y'abantu. Muri Cote d'Ivoire, isanganywe gahunda nk'iyo yo muri Ghana, ku wa mbere mu gitondo abantu bari batanguye gutonda imirongo ku bituro vyo gucandaga kugira bahabwe urucanco rwa mbere rwa AstraZeneca. Nigeria yiteze kuronka incanco zingana hafi miriyoni zine imbere y'uko iyi ndwi ihera. Professeur Gavin Yamey, yagize uruhara mu kwubaka umugambi wa Covax, yavuze ko bikenewe cane ko hatangwa incanco kw'isi yose. Ati: "Vyari bibabaje kubona ingene ibihugu bitunze cane cane bisakumba, "Vyari vyacitse nko kwikwegerako, gutanganwa, kandi ivyo si ukuba ari bibi gusa, ni n'akaga ku magara y'abantu." Gahunda zo gucandaga zaratevye gutangura muri Africa, ariko uwo mugabane w'isi  hagaragaye ibitigiri bito  vy'abanduye n'abapfuye ugereranije n'ibihugu vy'i Buraya. Umugambi wa Covax wizeye gutanga incanco zingana na miliyaridi 2 ku bantu bo mu bihugu 190 mu kiringo kidashika umwaka.

column2: Uyu muringa ukingira abagore umugera wa SIDA?
column3: Hari akaringa gashasha gaherutse kwemerwa n'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, ko kokoreshwa mu gukingira abagore umugera wa SIDA. Ni akaringa gakozwe muri silicone  kinjizwa mu gitsina c'umugore maze kakarekura umuti witwa dapivirine urwanya umugera. N'aho hari intambwe zimaze gushikwako mu kuvura no gukinga, umugera wa SIDA uracasasika inganda mu bihugu bitari bike cane cane ku mugabane wa Afrika. Ibice bibiri vya bitatu vy'abantu bose banduye umugera wa SIDA kw'isi bari ku mugabane wa Afrika, bafise imyaka hagati ya 15 na 24, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishirahamwe ONU. Mu buseruko n'ubumanuko bwa Afrika, abantu barenga imiriyoni 20 bagendana uwu mugera. Abagore bakiri bato nibo ahanini babangamirwa: ku ncuro zibiri ugereranije n'abagabo, abagore nibo bafise igihamana kibi co kwandura umugera wa SIDA. OMS iherutse gutanga uburenganzira bwo gukoresha uwu muringa kugira ngo abagore bashobore kwikingira mu gihe bakora imibonano mpuzabitsina. Mu kiganiro Africa Daily ca BBC, Doreen Morah Moracha w'imyaka 28 aba i Nairobi muri Kenya, asanzwe agendana umugera wa SIDA avuga ko kwikingira ari co kintu ca mbere kiza imbere mu kurwanya uwu mugera. Moracha amaze imyaka 16 yose afata imiti yo gupfupfahaza. Kubw'iwe, gufata iyi miti ubuzima bwose si ikintu coroshe. Ati: "Nipfuza ko abandi bose bokwikingira uwu mugera wa SIDA, kubera burya hari abibaza ko ari ibintu vyoroshe, ariko gufata imiti ubuzima bwawe bwose si ikintu coroshe na gato". Bumwe mu buryo bukoreshwa cane mu kwikingira umugera wa SIDA, harimwo udukingirizo, harimwo mbere n'agakingirizo k'abagore. Umupfasoni Moracha avuga ko abagore batoroherwa kugakoresha kubera akenshi usanga atari bo bifatira ingingo. Avuga ko abagabo bobo boroherwa gukoresha agakingirizo kabo kubera akenshi umugabo ari we afata ingingo. Ati: "Iyo umugore asavye ko bokwikingira, umugabo atabishatse aca akamomora akagata, rero muri ico gihe umugore nta bubasha aba afise bwo gufata ingingo". Hari kandi ibinini bifatwa imbere canke inyuma y'imibonano mpuzabitsina (PREP) ku muntu atarandura uwu mugera, ariko ibi navyo ntivyoroshe kuronka. Uwo muringa uje kuba nk'inyishu kuri izo ngorane. Ni umuringa wambarwa mu kiringo c'imisi 28, hanyuma muri ico kiringo cose ugasohora umuti uzwi nka dapivirine utuma umuntu atandura umugera wa SIDA. Anna Kukundakwe ajejwe imigambi mu kigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu, uburenganzira bwa muntu n'iterambere muri Uganda avuga ko ikintu nyamukuru ari uko umugore we nyene ubwiwe ashobora kwishirira uru muringa mu gitsina, atarinze gufashwa n'umuganga. Ati: "Kenshi iyo umugore yipfuza gukora imibonano mpuzabitsinda yikingiye, ntibimworohera gusaba ko uwo bashaka kuyikorana yambara agakingirizo. Ariko uwu muringa uramuha ububasha bwo kwikingira igihe abishatse mw'ibanga, kandi ntategerezwa kubwira umugabo ko awambaye". Mu bikorwa vyo kugerageza uwu muringa, vyabonetse ko igihamana kibi co kwandura uwu mugera cagabanutse gushika ku bice vyababa 30% gusa, ariko Rachel Bagley arongoye igisata co gupima imiti mw'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS, avuga ko bishobora kuja hasi gusumba. Uwu muringa wambarwa n'uyo mugore yiyizi ko atarandura umugera kandi yiyizi ko akunze gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina, umupfasoni Anna akavuga ko abadakunze gukora iyo mibonano batokwirukira uwo muringa. Ati: "Rero abagore boronswa inyigisho zikwiye mu buryo bwose bushoboka kugira ngo bashobore kwihitiramwo bo nyene uburyo bokoresha, nimba bipfuza gukoresha agakingirizo, ibinini canke uwu muringa". Igiciro c'uwo muringa ntikiramenyekana neza, ariko umupfasoni Bagley avuga ko utegerezwa kuzoba utazimvye, uri ku giciro kimwe n'ubundi bukingirizo. Yipfuza ko uwu muringa woba ku giciro giciriritse cane cane mu bihugu bikenye birangwamwo umugera ku rugero runini, mbere ugatangwa ku buntu.

column2: Sead Kolasinac wa Arsenal yarwanye n'abasuma babiri
column3: Umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru wo muri Bosnia akiniria ikipe ya Arsenal, ariko aritwa intwari ku mbuga hwaniro nyuma yo kugaragara atana mu mitwe n'abasuma babiri. Abo basuma bari biyoberanije bashaka kwiba imodoka izimvye uwo mukinyi na mugenzi wiwe bari barimwo. Sead Kolasinac yari atwawe mu modoka na rurangiranwa w'Umudage, Mesut Ozil, bari i London igihe ivyo vyaba. Video yagaragaye yerekana Kolasinac ata kirwanisho afise, ahangana n'abasuma babiri bari bambaye inkofero z'abagira kw'ipikipiki. Abo basuma kandi bari bitwje imbukiga, ariko nticabujije Kolasinac kubatesha bagata bakomoka. Ikipe ya Arsenal ivuga ko abo bakinyi bose bameze neza kandi ko ata n'umwe yakomeretse, igipolisi kikaba kiriko kirakora itohoza.

column2: Umunsi wahariwe abagore: Mu Burundi ngo baraciye akenge ko kwishira hamwe
column3: Mu gihe isi yaraye ihimbaje umunsi mpuzamakungu wahariwe guharanira uburenganzira bw'abakenyezi n'iterambere ryabo, muri iyi ndwi turacihweza aho isemo igeze kuri iki kibazo c'uburinganire ku burenganzira hagati y'abagabo n'abagore. Mu Burundi, abagore ngo baramaze guca akenge ko kwishira hamwe mu migwi yo gukorera hamwe, bikabatuma kuronka umutahe no kugwiza umwimbu n'ubwo ibibazo bitabuze. Kimwe mu bibazo nyamukuru bisigaye ni ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina, aho mu ntara zigera kuri 19, harangwa ibigo bitatu gusa bishobora kwakira no gufasha mu buryo bwa mbere abakorewe ayo mabi. Ariko rero ngo ibintu biriko birahinduka mu nzira nziza. Ivyo Florentine Kwizera yabibwiwe n'uwujejwe umugambi w'iterambere ridakumira mw'ishirahamwe ACORD Burundi, Mme Sophie Havyarimana (umviriza ikiganiro aho hejuru ukanze kw'ifoto)

column2: Abaguzi b'ibinyobwa vya Brarudi mu Burundi basaba guhumurizwa
column3: Nyuma y'aho leta ivugiye ko atacatitutse mu buryo ishirahamwe Brarudi rihingura ibinyobwa vyaryo, ababifata amakenga ntarahera kuko akanovera katakiri kakandi. Ikigo ca leta y'u Burundi kijejwe kugenzura ubuziranenge bw'ibidandazwa, BBN giheruka kumenyesha ko naho akanovera k'ibinyobwa vya Brarudi koba katakiri nka mbere, ngo ntacatitutse ku buryo bihingurwa. Ariko abafata ivyo binyobwa ntibashize amakenga, imyidogo ikaba ikiri ya yindi mu gihe bobo bafashe ivyo binyobwa bumva neza ko "bitakiryoshe" nka mbere. Haca rero haza umwitwarariko wo kumenya niba ivyo binyobwa bisa n'ivyahindutse ata ngaruka vyobagirako naho leta isa n'iyihumuriza. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'abaguzi mu Burundi, Pierre Nduwayo, yabwiye BBC ko vyumvikanye ko ivyo binyobwa bifise icahindutse. Yagize ati: "Biboneka mu nzoga, twaratanguye kuvyumva cane cane nko muri za Royale (Amstel), hamwe n'amafana. "Ivyo n'imbere y'uko umushikiranganji abishikiriza imyidogo y'abaguzi twari tumaze kuyumva. Kandi na twebwe ubisomye urumva ko akanovera kahahora gasa n'akahindutse." Bwana Nduwayo yabandanije avuga ko Brarudi mu bisanzwe yahora inyaruka mu gushikiriza ibijanye n'ibinyobwa vyayo ariko ko ubu ataco iravuga. Yagize ati: "Brarudi twari dusazanzwe tuzi ko ari ishirahmwe rikunda kuza riramenyesha ibintu vyabo aho bihagaze n'ubwo hoba hari ingorane bakazishikiriza. "Ariko kuva iyo myidogo itanguye bari mu gacerere ntangere, ni naco gituma twovuga duti ahubwo nibave muri ako gacerere  bashikirize nabo kuri ayo magenga abaguzi boba bafise..." Uwo aserukiye abaguzi yabandanije avuga ko naho leta ivuga ko ata ngorane zihara, akanovera gafise akamaro kanini mu gutuma abaguzi bahurumbira ikidandazwa ico ari co cose. Rero ngo naho boba bababwira ko ata ngorane kandi bumva ako kanovera karahindutse, ntibibuza ko bagira amakenga.

column2: Uganda: Uwigize umuhanuzi w'idini yakubise abayoboke yapfunzwe
column3: Umugabo wo muri Uganda yigize umuhanuzi w'idini yagirijwe ivyaha vyo guhohotera no gukora urudandaza rw'abantu. Umuhanuzi Kintu Dennis w’ishengero Hoima Empowerment Church International yabonetse muri video yarabwe cane ariko arakubita inkoni abayoboke b’ishengero ryiwe. Igipolisi cafashe uwo mugabo w’imyaka 42 kuwa gatatu w’ino ndwi ari kumwe n’abandi bayoboke b’iryo shengero bane nyuma y’aho iyo video yitwariwe. Afatwa amasanamu ariko arategeka abakozi bo mw’ishengero ngo baje imbere y’isengero bakubitwe canke bahebe kugaruka mu masengesho bace banatakaza amahirwe yo gukora kuri microphone yiwe. Ico gihe cose, abaje gusenga bagumye barorera mu gihe abo bakozi baza barakubitwa umwe inyuma y’uwundi hariko haravuga akaziki koroheje ka piano. Umuhanuzi Kintu yabariye abakora itohoza ko yariko arasubiramwo ivyo Yezu yakoze, igihe yasanga abantu bariko baradandariza mw’isengero, nk’uko biri mu rwandiko rw’igipolisi. Abajejwe intwaro kandi bavuga yuko yayobora iryo shengero atavyemerewe n’amategeko. Ugusaka kwakozwe m’iryo sengero kwatoye inkoni zitatu igipolisi kivuga yuko ari zo zakoreshwa mu gukubita abayoboke. Kintu Dennis yagumijwe mw’ibohera gushika itari indwi Nyakanga (9). Uganda ifise amashengero menshi ya gi-Kristu akorera hose mu gihugu. Ntagenzurwa kandi menshi muri yo atwarwa n’abagabo canke abagore biyita intumwa z’Imana.
